1.content:
The sun cut through your window and landed directly on your eyes, as it was apt to do on bright summer days. You blinked your eyes, stretched your limbs, and lazily sat up in bed.

"'Nother day, hmm?" You ran your hands through your bed-head hair and tried to wipe the sleep out of your eyes. "At least I woke up normal sized."

You almost wanted to laugh, but since school was out, and there was no where you "needed" to be, shrinking was a very real possibility. Would you even make it through the morning? Who knows...

You did another quick stretch and hopped into your clothes. What will you do now?
1.title: Summer Mornings

choices: She Goes Outside
She Goes To Her Bedroom
11.content:
You bounce into the kitchen wearing only your underwear to get something to eat and see your mother sitting at the kitchen table with her arms folded. She has a bunch of opened mail on the table in front of her. She looks at you with a frustrated look. Something's wrong. You begin to feel uncomfortable. She breaks the silence.

"What did we decide about your progress at school?" she interrogated.

You froze there in dread. A while back your mother had threatened that if your grades didn't improve she would punish you over the summer. You tried hard but you're just not cut out for school work. You had been placed into a grade higher than you should have at the insistence of your mother despite not having the intelligence or aptitude to succeed. You'd always found it impossibly hard to get good grades.

"Um...", you muttered.

Your mother carefully stood up. She was wearing a black tank top and white short-shorts. She had white mule slippers on her feet.

"Do you remember what I said I would do if your grades didn't improve?" she asked.

You remain silent. Hoping that she will just lightly scold you and then you can be on your way.

"DO YOU!?" she shouted.

"Uh...yes...", you stammered, "you said you'd punish me over the summer."

"That's right dear", she replied suddenly cheerful. "I intend to keep that promise, so just stay right there as I shrink you okay."

"Mom, please don't."

"Hush dear", she cooed, "it's for your own good."

Your mother began to rise into the air as you shrink. Your underwear becomes loose and falls to the ground. She slowly shuffles towards you as you get smaller and smaller. Chest high, then waist high, then knee high, finally stopping at about 6 inches tall and staring straight ahead at your mother's ankles as they flowed out of her slippers. You slowly crane your head up and she is smiling down at you as she brushes her hair behind her ears.

You begin to stumble backwards in horror as she slowly bends down to grab you. Tripping over your huge underwear and falling on your back in the process.

"No! Please no!", you plead.

"Stop begging ", you mom scolds you as she wraps her fingers around your waist, "it makes you sound pathetic."

You lay limp in your mother's huge fist as it sways to and fro beside her hips while she walks. What's going to happen next you ponder fearfully?
11.title: Grab Some Breakfast

choices: You Rub The Sunscreen On Her Feet
Make
111.content:
The living room flashes by as your mother strolls through it towards the French doors. You continue to lay limp in her fist as you dread to find out what will happened next. She continues through the doors and out onto the patio towards a lounge chair. The chair has a large towel draped over it and a big bag is positioned down beside it. Your mother dumps you onto the middle of the lounge chair and then proceeds to remove her tank top. You stare up at her as she places her top into the bag and then wiggles out of her shorts revealing a bright yellow bikini underneath. Somehow your mother as retained her youthful looks and body. She slips out of her slippers and picks up the shorts to deposit into the bag as well.

She adjusts her bikini and then looks down at you with a smirk.

"I suggest you move that way", she commands as she points to the end of the lounge chair, "unless you want me to sit on you."

You take off running as your mother's impressively huge form begins to lower onto the chair. You feel the ground beneath you shift and shake as it absorbs her weight. Suddenly a massive thud occurs behind you, as though a huge boulder smashed into the ground. You are fling a few feet into the air and land on your nose. You turn your head to look back to see your mother's left foot now come slamming down onto the chair behind you and next to her right foot which had cause the first earthquake.

"Sorry dear", she says with mock sympathy, "almost crushed you there."

She reaches into her bag to extract a pair of sunglasses and sunscreen lotion. She places the glasses on her face and begins shaking the bottle of sunscreen.

"Stand up!", she commands. You do as you are told and are now facing directly at her feet. Her toes, painted with white nail polish wiggle slightly as she shuffles to get comfortable. You can see her face over her knees as she smirks down at you.

"Now", she commands as she opens the bottle of sunscreen, "I want to take advantage of this beautiful day and you're going to make sure I'm comfortable. First thing you can do is rub sunscreen on my body."

You gulp as she squirts a large drop of sunscreen on top of each foot.

"You can begin by rubbing sunscreen on my feet first."

You looked about as your mother squirted some sunscreen on her arms and began rubbing it in. The lounge was quite low to the ground. You could easily jump off and make a run for it. Maybe run inside and hide somewhere, see if you can get help from your sisters. Or you could run and hid in the flowerbeds and try get some help from your neighbors. Your thoughts were interrupted by your mother snapping her fingers.

"Chop! Chop!" she hisses, "better start rubbing my feet or I'll make you do something worse."
111.title: She Goes Outside

As your mother was distracted with putting more sunscreen lotion on your arm, you jumped off the lounger chair and landed on the patio tiles below.

"You did not just do that!?" your mother bellows from above as she shuffles to get up.

You take off running at full speed. You look back to see your mother stand up and begin putting her feet into her slippers.

"You're going to regret that!", she growled.

You look forward and sprint with all your might.

Martha kicks off her slippers and lounges back down in the sun. She reaches down with her free hand to straighten her bikini tops and bottoms before turning her attention to her son in her fist. She straightens the sunglasses on her face and then looks sternly down at her son.

"Now why would you go and do that?" she asked rhetorically. "I feed you. I take care of you. All I ask in return is that you work hard and obey me."

You gulp as your heart continues to beat through your chest.

"I'm not in the mood to accept your apology dear. I've decided what I'm going to do with you."

"Now you're the perfect size to...
11122212.title: She Shrinks You Down To 2 Inches

111222121.content:
You squirm between the giant fingers that grip you. Unable to free yourself. Your mother reaches down into her bag and extracts her cellphone.

"Mom. Please no. I'm sorry. Please don't eat me", you beg.

Your pleas fall on deaf ears as your mother extends her arm out drifting you further from her face while she places her phone in front of it. She taps on the screen and then holds it up against her ear.

"Mom!" you scream.

"Shut up!" she snaps back as you can hear the ringing from the cellphone's speaker. Eventually someone answers.

"Hi Rachel", your mom beams into the phone, "will you do me a huge favour and bring me the bottle of syrup from the kitchen please...I'm outside...Please dear, I'm too comfortable to move...thanks doll, love you."

Your mother hangs up the phone and leans over to deposit it back into her bag. She then brings her son closer to her and cradles him on her chest just above her bikini top as she lies back down and relaxes. You can hear her heart beating through her chest and you rise and fall with her breathing.

"Mom...", you whimper.

"Yes dear", she responds in kind.

"Please don't eat me. I promise I won't do that again."

"Don't beg dear. It's very unattractive."

You hear the sound of flip flops approach and you lift your head to see your sister approach carrying a bottle of syrup.

"Here you go mom", she says as she dangles it in front of Martha's face. "OH MY GOD!" she then shrieks as she spots her tiny brother cradled against Martha's chest. "He's soo small. What did he do this time?"

Martha grabbed the bottle of syrup. "Thanks honey", she sang. "Oh you know", she giggles, "he didn't improve at school so now he gets to sunbathe with mommy."

Rachel burst out laughing. "What a loser", she chuckled. "Can I play with him afterwards please! Please!"

"Of course honey", Martha promised.

"Yay!" Rachel exclaimed as she skipped back inside the house.

Your sense of relief that perhaps you weren't going to be eaten was short lived as Martha flicked the cap of the syrup bottle open and lifted her son off of her chest.

"You said I was going to sunbathe with you and play with Rachel afterwards", you burst out, hoping that your Mother will realize the promises she just said.

"You are going to sunbathe with me dear", she replied as she turned the syrup bottle upside down an started to shake the syrup downwards.

"Only thing is", she continued as the giant bottle moved over your head. "You won't have to worry about being sunburnt cause you'll be inside my tummy", she chuckled. A huge sticky drop of syrup landed on your head and quickly surrounded your whole head. You flung your hands about to keep your eyes and nose clear so you could see and breathe. Another huge drop landed on your head and ran down your body coating your chest and legs. Some dripped off your legs and fell onto your mother's chest below as you flailed your legs.

Martha righted the bottle of syrup and flicked the cap closed. She dropped it into her bag and watched as her son continued to wipe syrup away from his eyes and nose. Four children was too much. It would be a relief to finally get rid of one. Without saying a word she opened her mouth and brought her son up to her extended tongue.

You look on in fear as you are lifted towards your mother's mouth. Her jaw opens to reveal her large white teeth. She extends her tongue and you are placed face down on top of it. The heavy weight of the syrup sticks you down onto the wet, spongy surface and you struggle to move. You feel your body rise with the tongue and light diminishes as you are brought inside your mother's maw. You lift your head and look back as you see a huge index finger covered with syrup follow you into the cave behind you. Lips close around the finger, blocking out the light. You are slammed into the roof of the mouth and pinned there as saliva rushes past you, extracting some of the syrup from your body. You very loudly hear your mother moan in pleasure. You are released from the roof and fall back down as light enters the mouth. You look back to see the index finger extract and disappear below the teeth only to be replaced by a thumb also covered with syrup.

It hovers past the teeth and once again the light is cut out as Martha closes her lips around her thumb and sucks on it and her delicious son inside her mouth. She moans as she tastes the sweetness of the syrup and swallows some of it. She extracts her thumb with an audible pop. She smiled wickedly as she then bounces her son inside her mouth briefly.

You lose track of what's up and down as you are flung about your mother's wet mouth; You hit yourself against her teeth. You brush past her gums. You kick against the inside of her cheeks and then suddenly you are hammered up against the roof of he mouth and held there briefly before the sticky floor below you suddenly drops and you feel yourself enter into a smooth tube head first. Your arms are squeezed against your body and despite your kicking legs you begin to fall. A loud, sickening gulp confirms that you have left your mother's mouth and are sliding down her throat.

Martha sighs contently as she feels her son descend down her neck. She looks down at her flat tummy and notices small drops of syrup on her breasts and upper chest. She scoops them up with her finger and sucks the delicious fluid off of it. She moans again at the taste.

Jacob plummets into a pitch black chasm. It's incredibly hot and humid. It smells strongly like coffee and it's difficult to breathe. There is thick, sticky liquid all around him that irritates his skin. He can hear his mother's loud heartbeat coming from above him. He then hears her moan loudly.

"You tasted delicious dear" Martha says to her tummy and then pats it.

You can hear your mother speak. It sounds like it's coming from speakers all around. It's muffled but you can understand clearly. You hear some loud patting against the walls of her stomach.

"MOM! PLEASE!" you shout, "Please let me out!"

"Oh my!" Martha exclaims, "I can hear you dear." Her son's voice is faint but it's clearly coming from inside her. She softly rubs her tummy and smiles.

"Mom! Please!"

"Oh dear, you don't remember that you were once inside me before. Now you're back. Where you belong."

"I don't want to die in here"

"Hush now dear. This is happening, accept it. Now be quiet, mommy wants to relax and sunbathe. It's such a lovely day."

You continue to shout but your mother doesn't respond. The floor below you shuffles and twists. You lose your balance and fall flat on your face. Stomach acid covers your face and stings your eyes. You wince in pain. You continue to cry out for help.

Martha shakes her head in disgust as she continues to hear her son beg from inside her. She stops applying sunscreen to her arms and leans down to reach her phone and ear buds in her bag. She feels her son tumble in her stomach and smirks. Clutching the phone and buds in her hand she leans back, placed the buds in her ear and connects them to the phone. She opens the Spotify app and plays some Ed Sheeran. Finally, she can relax as her son's cries are drowned out by the music. She returns to applying sunscreen on her body as she hums along to the music. She then lies back down on the lounge chair enjoying the heat of the sun on her body and calmly drifts off to sleep.

You continue to scream inside your mother's stomach. Her only reply is melodic humming. Minutes later you are out of breath and breathing start to gets very difficult. You start to feel extremely tired and can't help but lie down on the hot, wet surface. Your eyelids become heavy and you drift off to sleep. The rhythmic beating of your mother's heart drifts you off to sleep reassuringly. You never wake up again.

12.content:
You wandered into the living room, still wiping sleep out of your eyes. No one seemed to be around, although you were sure they would show up soon enough. Taking a seat on the far side of the couch, you stretched out and clicked the television on with the remote. Flipping around yielded no immediate results, so you left on a nature documentary and zoned out a bit.

You must have still been pretty tired, because before you knew it you'd dozed off again.

---sometime later---

You awoke to a sudden heavy pressure, and the dank, sweaty smell of sneakers. That could only mean one thing.

"Oh $&%*" You thought. "I left myself unguarded. Stupid stupid stupid!"

You flailed for a second, but found that the normal resistance of the situation wasn't there. You opened your eyes to daylight and your sister Rachel pressing her worn sneaker into your face. She pulled it away and grinned a devilish grin.

"Smell good, squirt?" She said, tossing her shoe by the door with her other one. "It's hot as hell out today, and I figured you'd like a sample."

"Jeez Rachel, don't scare me like that," You said, "I'd thought someone had-"

"Oh, I know exactly what you thought, little brother. Just wanted to see how much you'd panic." She snickered and pulled your legs off the couch, sitting on the opposite side.

You eyed her suspiciously, but went back to watching TV. After a while, she glanced over at you and smirked.

"This is pretty boring." She said, apparently disinterested in the flora and fauna of New Guinea.

"Yeah, but nothing else is on." You sighed lightly.

"Well..." She started, getting up and kneeling by the TV, "If you're bored too, let's make it exciting."

You looked over and saw that she was setting up the old N64.

"Let's play Mario Kart. Same rules as usual?" She asked, giving you a competitive look that made you feel queasy. The 'usual rules' were simple. If you won, she would take care of your chores for a weekend. If she won, she would get to shrink you and do whatever she wanted. Whatever she wanted, of course, normally involved you, her shoe, and an endless mashing of sweaty toes.

"I can understand if you're too scared..." She goaded, "You already smelled my shoe. It is pretty rank." She laughed to herself.

Big decision time. If you accept, you'd have to be pretty lucky to win and escape another humiliating day. If you don't, she'll probably find another way to bring 'excitement' to the day, and if you're unbelievably lucky it won't be way worse than just gracefully losing at Mario Kart.
12.title: Go to the living room to watch TV

choices: "Let's do it 'Liv.  He'll barely survive in my shoes."
"Maybe later.  I'm gonna make him clean my feet first."
121.content:
"Fine, let's do it." You sighed, figuring the past of least resistance was probably the best. And who knows, maybe you'd get a free weekend out of it.

"That's the spirit, little brother! Now c'mon, sit down." Rachel grinned at you and patted the seat on the floor next to her.

You sat down and grabbed your favorite controller, while Rachel grabbed hers. At the character select screen, your sister immediately navigated to Toad. You weighed your options. Normally you'd be Luigi, but maybe today you could outgrow your Player-2 status. Maybe today you could, for once, outdo your sister. Maybe today you could be your own hero. Pumped with adrenaline, you chose Mario. You sat waiting for your sister to choose a stage.

"Ready to get crushed?" She teased, knowing the double entendre wouldn't be lost on you. But you didn't even listen to her. You were already hyper-focused on the screen. You knew already you would win.

You were also dead wrong.

The race was over faster than you could comprehend it. Toad's shrill voice carried through the room: "I'm the best!"

"Hear that, loser?" Rachel swung around to look you in the eyes. She pointed her thumb at her chest. "I'm the best. And what do you think you are?"

"Um, um, what?" You instinctively began backing away.

"You are nothing but a bug. Ready to pay up?" She stood up and towered over your seated form.

"No, no, no, wait a second."

"Too baa~aad!" She sang the words. Your vision began to swim and stir as the unknown shrinking process began. The room suddenly stretched up and around, like looking through a fish-eye lens. Your sister, though psychologically a colossus before, was suddenly a real one. You closed your eyes during the final moments, and when you opened them again it was complete. You were barely an inch tall, lying on your back in the carpet fibers.

Your sisters looming form took two steps forward, so that her feet partially surrounded you.

"Hello, my little bug brother." She cruelly smirked down at you. "Ready for the usual torture?"

It didn't matter if you were ready or not. She lifted her sweaty foot and slowly lowered it on you. The smell immediately consumed you, even as much as you tried to breath through your mouth.

"How does it smell? Worse than my shoe?" She laughed and wiggled her toes over your tiny face.

"Augh, yes." You squeaked, but you knew she would never hear you at this size.

She slowly pressed down, and then lifted her foot so that you were stuck fast on her tacky soles.

"Eeew, you're stuck to my gross feet. I don't know if they've been sweaty enough to pick you up like this before." She said, scrunching her foot, but was unable to quite unstick you. They had been sweaty enough to pick you up before, you thought, but you supposed the memory was more emotionally charged for you than her.

"Welp, I guess if you like my feet enough to cling to them like this, you'll love my shoes."

You immediately began to struggle, managing to pry yourself free. Your sister's raunchy feet were one thing, but those shoes were torture on the completely different scale. You flopped to the ground weakly and looked up at your sister. She rested her foot on the ground again, put her hands on her hips, and bent over slightly to look at you.

"Or maybe you don't want to do that? Hmm, what to do, what to do...maybe I'll just have you lick them clean instead..." She smirked. She had you beaten no matter what she chose. Rachel lifted her heel, ready to pin you again, but suddenly someone walked into the room. You turned over to see the smaller feet of your younger sister pad into the room.

"What'cha doin Rachel?" Olivia asked, leaning on the doorway of the living room.

"Playing with our little brother." Rachel pointed you out on the floor. "I was thinking about sticking him in my shoes for a while."

"Ooooh, your old sneakers? That's gotta stink for him." Olivia giggled.

"Well, of course." Rachel shrugged, as if the point was plainer than day.

"Hey, I know, why don't we go play some basketball? Then it'll be real torture for the twerp." Olivia said.

Real torture? You were incredulous at the thought. Was the rest was just pretend torture? You looked up at your twin sister, who was deep in thought. She looked down at you and grinned.
121.title: Accept her challenge

choices: "Sure, why not." *

1211.content:
"Let's do it 'Liv. He'll barely survive in my shoes." Rachel said.

"NO" You screamed at the top of your lungs but of course they couldn't hear you nor will they care if they did, you have been their object of torture for practically years for what you can remember, or what it feels like at least.

Rachel lifted her foot over you, casting a shadow over your tiny form, "Hey Liv, before we play wanna see something cool?"

"Hm? Sure!" Olivia said looking down at you, "I don't think stepping on him will be classified as cool tho."

"You'll seeeee~" Rachel sang the words and lowered her foot on you. The smell, no matter how many times you have smelled it, you can never get used to it.

Suddenly Rachel stomped down, knocking all the wind out of you, forcing all of the fresh air out and the smell of your sister's feet in, Rachel twisted her foot a bit and applied more pressure and said. "Wait I have to make sure of something."

Rachel sat down and lifted her legs to let Olivia see it and just as you thought, you were stuck again at the ball of her foot.

"Omg, eewww." Olivia laughed and smiled. "I never knew our little brother loves your feet, Rachel. I'm a bit jealous."

"Yeah well, I do love him dearly, and he loves my feet back dearly." Rachel said smiling. "Maybe if you use him 24/7, he'll start loving you too"

There was no way of escaping this, fate has probably written this on the internet, something that can never disappear. You thought to yourself as you try your best to free yourself and not to accidentally breath through you nose.

"Liv, can you get my shoes?" Rachel said and placed her leg down, applying a bit more pressure so you can't escape this time.

Olivia raised an eyebrow and smiled, "no socks?"

"No socks." Rachel smiled back.

Olivia turns back and went to get her shoes from the door.

No socks?! The combination of sweaty feet and old stinky shoes minus socks equals to living hell on Earth, this is the proof that hell exist, you sisters feet and shoes together with no soc- Your thoughts were interrupted with another hell coming, "Can I use him as an insole in our second match?" Olivia said as she came back with Rachel's shoes.

Rachel grinned. "I don't see why not, hmmm....I wonder what our little brother smell like with both of our feet smell combined."

Hell I suppose, you thought to yourself.

Olivia placed both of Rachel's shoes down. "hmmm....probably like roses" Olivia giggles. "Let's try it later."

Rachel giggles. "After our foot massage?"

Olivia nodded.

Rachel lifter her feet into the air. "Get all those fresh air, little brother, you'll need it" Rachel laughs and wears both of her shoes.

The smell was as you remembered, really bad, like some sort of sweaty cheese. These shoes were with her probably for years now, sometimes it amazes you how they're not yet broken or worn out, but if you look inside her shoes, you can very well see clear footprints in her insoles which is the proof of how old and how many times she has worn them. The air was knocked right out of you as the weight of your sister all goes to her feet as she stands up. Your clothes were all soaked up by Rachel's sweaty insoles and by her feet.

"Ohhhh too bad, all that fresh air is out of your lungs now~" Rachel teased as she wiggled her toes, "Hmm...you feel nice, little brother."

Olivia turns her back to the door and starts to walk outside. Rachel followed her, you feel everything heat up and the sweat on your twin's foot starts to get a bit sweaty already.

"Wanna go for a jog, first?" Rachel suggested. "My "new insole" feels so nice, I just wanna keep mashing it with my foot while feeling its softness."

Olvia turned around and said.

"Er...jeez, I dunno..." You stammered, looking around nervously. How in the world were you going to get out of this one?

"Oh c'mon you big baby, it'll be fun." Rachel pushed.

"Well yeah, for you...I mean, um..." You racked your brain, "Maybe we could grab some breakfast first or something? And play later?"

"You're just coming up with excuses. If you don't want to play just say so." She curled her lips, making you shudder a bit. Before any more words could be exchanged though, you were both interupted by a sound from the hallway.

Olivia poked her head into the room, hands fixing the hair tie on her braid.

"Mornin guys," She said, still looking a little sleepy. "What's going on?"

"Oh nothing. I want to play Mario Kart, but butt-face over here doesn't want to." Rachel jerked her thumb towards you.

"Hey wait, I didn't say-" You started.

"Oooh, sounds fun. I'll play." Olivia said, suddenly perking up and sneaking a sly look towards you.

"Man, good thing for you 'Liv, or I'd never have any fun." Rachel said, giving a light laugh, "What do you say we make it interesting?"

You suddenly felt your stomach jump up to your throat.

1232112.content:
"I bet Kelly would get a real kick out of playing with you. Let's go pay her a visit, hmm?" Rachel said, rolling you to the toe of her shoe and sliding her sweaty foot in. As the last of the light disappeared from where you entered, your sister's toes spread over your body, "And don't forget, kiddo, lick 'em."

For a moment you felt weightless and then BOOM, gravity tripled and your body went flat under Rachel's weight. This repeated again and again as Rachel's foot acted like a parabolic airplane. You stuck your tongue out and tried to lick the moist flesh that surrounded you in spite of the harsh circumstances.

You remembered learning once that parabolic airplanes were used to train astronauts. You'd be a shoe-in, no pun intended, if anyone would ever believe you.

#######################################################


"Yo Rachel! What's up?" You heard a heretofore unknown voice greet your sister.

"Not a whole lot, Kel. Figured I'd stop by and share today's loot." Rachel laughed, stepping inside.

"I saw on Twitter! Is your brother in your shoe now?" Kelly asked.

"Sure is! Want to take a turn making his life hell?" Rachel said, prying her other sneaker off.

"Oh my god, absolutely. Bring him to the couch, I'll grab drinks." You heard Kelly walk off.

Suddenly light invaded your senses as Rachel's other foot broke free. Gravity suddenly inverted and you were thrown over the spongy sole and directly into your sister's waiting hand.

"Hear that, twerp? Your reputation precedes you." Rachel gave your body a painful squeeze as she walked over to the couch and dumped you on the floor. You looked at the ceiling, dazed, before Rachel's foot swung into view and her toe gave you a painful bop on the head, "And best behavior now, do whatever Kelly says. Otherwise I'll tape you to the bottom of my sneaker for the walk back, got it?"

Kelly bounced back into the room, handed Rachel a glass of something you couldn't identify, and sat down on the couch, immediately turning her attention to you.

"Oh wow, look how small he is! He's like a little bug-person!" Kelly chirped. She was a truly beautiful girl, with a short, black geometric cut, pale skin, and big green eyes.

"Nah, just a bug. He totally doesn't count as a person anymore. Maybe a bug-slave, if you really insist." Rachel laughed.

"I like the sound of that." Kelly purred. She slipped off her black loafers and peeled away her thin, fashionable socks. "These shoes make my feet sweat like hell, but they're too cute to pass up. Here bug-slave, lick in between these."

Kelly's foot lowered just in front of you, toes spread wide. You rallied your strength and pulled yourself over to her toes, sticking out your tongue and began to lick a complete stranger's sweat away. What the hell was happening in your life?

"Mmm, that's the stuff." Kelly wiggled her toes, causing a small piece of dark lint from her sock to come free and fall just in front of you. You moved to kick it out of your way, but suddenly Kelly spoke, "Eat that."

You looked up at her, barely able to see her mischevious eyes over her knees, and then over to Rachel, whose face you had a better angle at.

"Don't look at me, do what the lady says." Rachel rolled her eyes, as if it was that easy.

"Yeah bitch, eat my toe lint." Kelly spat, at which you immediately began choking down the sweaty fabric.

"Damn Kelly, you're a natural at this." Rachel said, crossing her leg and sipping on her drink.

"Well, my last girlfriend, you remember Enid right? She was really into being controlled in bed, so she got me into BDSM, and I got a serious thrill from being a domme." Kelly explained.

"Oh, that's awesome. What about your current girlfriend? Shannon? She into being on the bottom?" Rachel asked.

"Not really, she's more of a dominant girl too. We're not totally sure how to handle it." Kelly said.

All the while the girls were chatting, you had finished eating Kelly's gross lint and continued to lick the sweat from her toes. At the last statement though, you saw Rachel's eyes snap over to you. Oh god Rachel please, not with strangers.

"You know, you could always borrow my brother. Not only could he be a little bitch for both of you, you wouldn't even have to be careful about how you treated him. After all, he's just a bug-slave, not a real person." Rachel smirked down at you.

"Really Rachel? You'd let me?" Kelly's toes unconsciously curled over you.

"Of course! What are friends for? Speaking of which, sharing is caring, pass the runt over." Rachel snickered, as Kelly kicked you over to Rachel's feet, one of which immediately pinned you underneath.

"Lick my heels, bug. No breaks."

The girls made you serve their feet for a while as they chatted about boys and girls they found attractive and about interesting things to try in the bedroom.
Afterwards...

"Well, it's been super fun Kelly, but I should probably get home for dinner." Rachel said, pulling her feet off of you.

"Aww, that sucks. Do you want to go out after dinner? Me and Shannon were thinking of catching a movie and then maybe hitting up a bar." Kelly said, standing up and taking her and Rachel's empty glasses into the kitchen.

"It wouldn't be a third wheel situation, would it?" Rachel asked.

"Nah, I want you and Shannon to meet. Not to mention it'd be the four of us, wouldn't it?" Kelly sat back down and impishly eyed your bruised little body.

"That's a good point. Speaking of which..." Rachel started, resting her chin on her hand, "I haven't decided if the bug was well behaved enough to deserve a comfortable ride home."

This was absurd. You literally did everything they asked.

"Well, he didn't eat my sock lint right away. I thought that was a bit rude of him. Is my lint not good enough for you, buggy?" Kelly fake-pouted at you.

"Mm, he didn't, did he?" Rachel smirked before exchanging glances with Kelly, "What do you think that means for him, Kel?"

"I guess punishment!" Kelly bombastically exclaimed.

"Ding ding ding! Points to the beauty with the black hair!" Rachel laughed, before asking, "Do you have some tape?"

Dammit Rachel. Just...dammit.

Kelly bounded away to find tape and Rachel bounced over you, purposefully letting her heel drop just close enough to your head to make you panic momentarily. She returned quickly, sneaker in hand, just as Kelly popped back in with a roll of scotch tape.

"Sooo, whatcha gonna do to him?" Kelly asked, handing over the roll.

Rachel peeled off a piece of tape and stuck one side to the upper-center of her shoe, "You'll see..." She said, picking you up off the ground and placing you on the upturned shoe sole, face first, before stretching the strip of tape over your back and tightly affixing you. Her sole smelled like rubber and soil and it was already pressing your face hard enough to bruise.

"Oh wow, you're going to walk all the way home like that? Won't he get crunched on the sidewalk? Or drown if you step in mud or something?" Kelly's eyes seemed entranced on Rachel's perfect, simple cruelty.

"That depends on how hard I decide to walk on his weak little back," Rachel chuckled, "And that depends on his apology. Go on runt, apologize to Kelly for your behavior."

Rachel extended her sneaker towards Kelly, who quirked her head to catch your face pressed hard against the rubber sole.

"S-sorry, Kelly." You sputtered.

"Sorry for what, buggy?" Kelly's tongue flashed over her teeth.

"Sorry f-f-for not eating your lint." You couldn't believe you were actually demeaning yourself like this, "It was v-very mean of m-m-me."

"Yes, it was mean of you. But I guess I'll forgive you just this once." Kelly smirked before her face left your field of vision, "He does sound pretty sorry, Rachel."

"Yeah, he does..." Rachel pondered.

123211211.content:
"I guess we can give him a break." Rachel said sarcastically, flipping over her sneaker and placing it on the ground. Just the weight of the unworn shoe pushed you deep into the carpet fibers, making it difficult to hear their conversation.

"Well good then--------see you at---- -onight at 7? Let's----so he can------hehehe" You could hear the puckish voice of Kelly describing the night's plans, but not well enough to pick up the details.

"Sounds good." Rachel's voice barely made it under the sneaker, as did the shared laughter between the two friends.

There was a great bit of rustling around you as Rachel put on one sneaker, and then a sensory burst from the glare of the room lights and the sudden elevation as the shoe you were attached to was lifted.

"Ready to walk home, bro? I promise I'll be suuuuper careful. Or, well, as careful as I can be..." Rachel smirked as her hands worked the sneaker around her foot.

"Just make sure he makes it to dinner." Kelly said, giving Rachel a knowing prod to the arm.

"Fiiine." Rachel theatrically sighed. She placed her heel on the ground, not yet allowing the toe of her shoe, and therefore you, to touch it yet. "Every journey begins with one step, huh bug?" Rachel paused for a moment. "Ew, that made me sound too much like Chelsea. I've gotta stop hanging out with her so much."

With that, Rachel rose to her full height. The carpet rose up to meet you quickly, but you weren't buried completely. It seemed Rachel was putting more weight to the outer side of her foot, giving you some reprieve, although still piling on pressure that you wouldn't normally experience trapped under her toes.

"That hurt, buggy? If you think that's bad, wait until we get to the sidewalk." Rachel laughed, the sound muffled by your position. She gave Kelly a hug, said her quick goodbyes, and walked to the door.

*******

With each drop, shift, and lift of her leg, despite Rachel's attempts at taking ginger steps, you were nearly completely flattened on the concrete walkway, the sharkskin texture of cheaply paved quick-dry digging into your skin, adding scrapes and cuts to your already bruised and broken body. High above, practically in another world, Rachel hummed happily to herself, poking away on her phone.

"Wow, you wouldn't believe how many people are asking to borrow you." She said, never quite breaking her stride. "Had I known there would have been this much demand, I'd have outed you sooner. I can charge a rental fee and not even have to take a part-time job!"

You cringed with each step, now partially with embarrassment and the knowledge that Rachel probably wasn't kidding. In all likelihood, you were going to end up under every foot at school. Unless your mom stepped in, hopefully not literally, it seemed like this summer (and hopefully only this summer) was going to be a long, painful ordeal.

"If I'm going to treat you like such a workhorse though, I should at least make sure you don't...hm...get put out to pasture early. Wait, do horses go out to pasture?"

'No.' You thought to yourself, 'They get made into paste.' Which was what you were going to be if Rachel put more weight on you.

"And since I'm so good, (at protecting my investment) how about a niiiice drink of water." You could hear the sadistic joy dripping from those words and immediately pulled your head as far as you could from Rachel's sole and twisted your neck to see your sister's hanging foot slowly lowering towards a puddle at the edge of an intersection.

"Hahaha, drink up, buggy. You have until the light changes." Rachel laughed, and dipped her shoe into the shallow water just as you took a deep, sudden breath.

The murky, disgusting city water swirled around you as it settled from the sudden introduction of a sneaker. The whoosh of the water completely dominated your senses at first, but it suddenly became very, very quiet. You counted in your head slowly. '1...2....3............45....46....' Your lungs were already screaming. How long did walk signs usually last? Oh god, what if you really drowned. Taped to your smug sister's sneaker, taken out by muddy water. '55....56..."

Like a breaching whale, Rachel's sneaker pulled from the water in a misty spray. Your greedy lungs pulled in as much air as they could, over and over, before Rachel began walking again.

"See? I'm not totally without sympathy." Rachel said, although your heavy breathing made it difficult to hear. "Stick with me and you can have all the water you want, hahahaha."

*****

"I'm hooome!" Rachel called as she stepped into the house.

"Dinner's just about ready! Come sit down!" You heard your mother call back.

Rachel pulled off her sneakers, and set them by the door, yours bottom up. She knelt down and slowly removed the tape from your soaked, dirty, and above all massively pained body.

"Looks like dinner's on, squirt. Ready?" She smiled...

Your older sister Chelsea walked in, tossing a thick book on the couch and plopping down directly next to Rachel.

She let out a long, exasperated sigh, stretched her legs out and crossed her feet at the ankles, which were clad in patterned stockings and casual, black ballet flats.

"Uh, hey, what's up Chel'?" Rachel asked.

"There's nothing for me, Rachel. The world is boring. This house is boring. Even my work has started to bore me. It's like it's all conspiring against me." Chelsea leaned her head back to stare at the ceiling.

Rachel rolled her eyes, all too used to Chelsea's theatrics. Even you would have put your hand on your head in annoyance if your sister's dank sole wasn't trapping it underneath.

"Don't be such a drama queen." Rachel quipped, "Maybe if you're bored it just means you're boring."

"You know what? I'm just going to take that as a compliment and move on." Rachel's toes squeezed around you as she became more and more uncomfortable with this bizarre conversation, causing your body to become somewhat attached to the tacky digits. She lifted her foot on her heel and played with you by softly mashing your already hurt body rhythmically.

"Unlike some members of our family, you really do have a mind to be admired." Chelsea kept on, as if she didn't even hear Rachel's attempt to change the topic, "Some people in this household wouldn't hold a candle to our, how you might say, malin comme un singe.

Jesus, she was talking in French now. Chelsea was in full pompous self-importance mode, although Rachel seemed like she was starting to enjoy the compliments. Unless she was thinking something else...

"Hah, some people, huh? How 'bout this people?" She snickered, pulling her foot onto her knee and pointing at you, giving Chelsea a good look at your battered form stuck fast between her sweaty toes.

Chelsea readied her index finger against her thumb pad, and you closed your eyes and winced as you knew exactly what was coming next.

POW, her finger flicked forward and send you hurtling off of Rachel's sole, in a high, narrow arc through the air, and finally crashing to the ground with unfortunate force. What do you think, you inconsequential little shit, do you think I can make you so contrite you really do come apart into pieces?" Killing is simply transforming a stubborn piece of matter because it has..." She paused, choosing her words carefully, "...failed to amuse."

Hallelujah, Rachel was the goddamn messiah. You would have fist-pumped, but it probably would have broken your arm. Rachel rolled her eyes at Chelsea's exit and knelt down to inspect you.

"Man, you look like shit." She said, gingerly pinching your body and placing it into her hand.

"Yeah, whatever, if you weren't around, who would I torture?" She sat down on the couch and placed you on the end table beside her. "Seriously though, you're pretty beat up. If I'm going to play with you again, you're gonna have to heal up a bit."

Wait, really? Was this happening? Was Rachel, Rachel the Ruler, your ultimate oppressor, actually giving you a break?

"In fact..." She smirked her trademark smirk "...I think you might need some bandages."

And there went that moment of relief.

Rachel opened the drawer to the end table and pulled out a roll of masking tape. She carefully pulled a piece free, and tore it into thin strips. Gently holding your body and straightening your limbs (an act which was almost unbearable thanks to your heavy bruising) she wrapped the strips around your body, starting at your feet and spiraling up to meet your shoulders.

What was her obsession with you and her feet, anyway?

Your oxygen began to deplete quickly, your lungs burning for air, any air. Before unconsciousness took you, however, Rachel's toes opened up and you took a full lung's worth of noxious oxygen.

"--so it's really not something to be considered immoral, you see." Chelsea finished her sentence, the beginning of which was lost to your sticky prison.

"I, uh, see, I think." Rachel said, either out of genuine confusion, or not actually paying attention.

"Let me put it an easier way." Chelsea said, "Psalm 110: 'Sit at my right hand until I make your enemies a footstool for your feet.'"

"How appropriate," Rachel said laughing, "Here I am with my enemy as a footstool. Perfect!"

You continued to breath wearily, wondering how it was possible that your sisters could rationalize your suffering.

"But honestly Chel', even if you didn't tell me that, I'd still be torturing the runt. I don't care if it's right or wrong, I just like watching him suffer." Rachel said, basically answering your indignant confusion.

"How banal." Chelsea said, "It's much more interesting to work in a structure, don't you think?"

"Nah, you know me, I'm a rebel at heart. Any structure is too much structure." Rachel retorted. "By the way, since we're both sitting here, want to rest your feet a bit?"

Ugh, as if one pair of giant feet wasn't enough.

"May as well." Chelsea said, slipping off her flats. Rachel lifted her foot and wiggled her toes until your body came free, crashing to the carpet below. Chelsea's pretty patterned stockings came down on your body quickly and mashed it into their damp, smelly fabric.

Your sisters talked for at least an hour, occasionally passing you between themselves, their unforgiving and invincible toes covering your body in layer after layer of grime and dirt. Your entire world was nothing but mashing toes for what would only amount to 1/24th of a day, despite feeling like an eternity. How could your own family do this to you, you wondered, trying to dissociate from the torture.

Finally though, the crushing stopped, leaving you face up on the carpet, surrounded by the scent of your sisters' feet, staring up at their legs, behind which their bodies were completely hidden from view. For what reason are you granted such respite?
1232122.title: Continual Footstool

choices: You still under her foot.
Somehow, you came into view.
12321221.content:
"Girls, the dinner is ready!" The booming voice of your mother echoed distant.

“Okay!” Chelsea and Rachel replied, unison, standing up, and heading to dinner`s room. You can`t help, but watch their colossal legs moving and passing over your puny body. Despite all the bad treatment they give to you, there is a thing that you admitted inside of yourself: it was an admiring view. Somehow, their titanic body moving makes you feel almost mesmerized. When their booming steps became distant, you begin to force yourself to stand up. Some limbs are aching due the torture of stomping and footstool treatment. Your skin are impregnated by Chelsea and Rachel`s feet smell, which made you cringe your nose for a few seconds. “Ew... So stinky!” You mutters.

Once you checked yourself to keep on moving, you hear your mom`s voice again:

“Liv! where are you? Dinner is served.”

Booming steps were growing again, and you realized that it was your young sister Liv on the way. No soon you realized that, and her colossal body came into your view, in a quick pace, almost running. Your eyes grew wide and you dropped your mouth with the sight if our 13 years old giant sister coming right over you! Her booming steps were almost deafening, and soon you realize that her grey socked feet were coming right at the top of you.

“Liv…” But it was too late.

BOOM!

The cotton fibers were dirt, with some old sweat from the past days. Specs of dirt were clearly visible at your sight as it landed over you with no time to escape. A squishy, but muffled sound could be heard if another tiny person was close enough to not be stomped too. You were caught right at the bottom of her pad section, as it squished your body with mega tons. Your body sank softly in the sock surface. The pressure made your mind go nuts as your body felt an incredible jolt of pain. Your face was buried in a moist and stinky surface, wet by the foot sweat of Liv for all the morning. Quickly stuck to her giant sole, your only thought become just an instinct: survive. The smothering and the brutal stomping didn`t give you time for think. The time between one step and other was too short to try something.

Liv arrived at the dinner room, taking a seat and starting her meal. Her feet were landed on the wooden floor, not squishing you anymore, but firmly enough to not give you any chance to escape. Trying to ignore the pain, you squirm a lot to get yourself free, but with no result: you are completely buried on her socky stinky sole.

What will happen now?
12321221.title: Your Mother has called for dinner.

choices: You don’t react in time.
Run towards where Martha is sitting.
Run towards where the other girls are sitting.
123212212.content:
You were almost completely stuck to your oblivious sisters’ foot. You kept squirming until she seemed to notice enough to rub her feet together. Finally this allowed you to unstick and you fell on the ground under Liv’s feet.

Disorientated from the pummeling you just revived you slowly get to your feet thinking of where to escape. Next thing you know a sock lands on your right side followed by another one that landed on top of you. You crawl out from under and look up and see Liv inspecting her barefoot looking for what was bothering her. She looks down and the two of you make eye contact .
Everything seemed to stop and after a couple seconds a straight face turns into a sly grin sending shivers down your spine. Her foot starts descending towards you. How do you react?

.
123212212.title: Somehow, you came into view.

choices: Misery for the next 24 hours
12322.content:
"Ohh!" Rachel says, "I know just what to do with you!! Olivia, go get me some tape!" She hums a sweet little jingle while Olivia goes to get the tape from the kitchen handiness drawer.

Your eyes go wide as you realize what Rachel will do! "No, Rachel! NO! Don't even think about it!" You start backing up in fright, and fall back over one of Rachel's shoes.

"Seems like you figured out what I'm going to do to you, huh? Tape you to my bare foot that you hate so much!"

"Olivia", you say in panic, "run and get mom, quick!!"

"Too late, little bro, it's a done deal! Now, where do you want to face?"

"You can't be this cruel, Rachel!"

Olivia spoke up, "it's only for a day!"

"Yeah, it's only for a day, so stop whining, little bro!"

You sigh, "well, I suppose if it's only for a day, then I can live with that! I'd rather be facing the floor!"

"Okay! facing my awful foot it is!"
12322.title: Rachel wants to abuse you in more enduring ways.

choices: Rachel goes jogging
Rachel climbs stairs, over and over
123221.content:
Rachel smirked as she sat on the floor with her foot over her other knee, positioning you just right so you could experience the optimum level of misery. "Da, da da, da, da, da!" Rachel hummed as she put you through hell. "Heh, heh! Perfect! What do you think, bro?"

You were unsure what to think! Judging from the awful smelling piggies above you, you had to conclude that you were lying width-wise just under her toes; one of the smelliest parts! Because your face was buried in smelly flesh, you could only say "MMMPH!"

"Wonderful!" Rachel hummed again as she wrapped her grimy toes over your body.
123221.title: Misery for the next 24 hours

choices: After dinner, she goes to her bf, Jeff's house, for some more torture of you
1232211.content:
"I think I'll go jogging!" Rachel says to herself, and also for your misery!

"MMPH" Is about as interesting as your speech gets right now. You can't believe it! Actually, knowing Rachel's cruelty, you can absolutely believe it! The god awful smelling toes above you scrunch around your body as they express their delight!

Rachel jogs to the entrance where her ratty sneakers are. Humming, she slips them on. "See ya later, mom! Going for a run before dinner!" She exits.

***

During the run, Rachel's toe crevices kept getting sweatier and kept being shoved into your face as her toes kept curling over your body! To make matters worse, you had to involuntarily press your lips to her awful skin!

***

After 1 hour she came back home. Taking her shoes off at the entrance, and walking to the kitchen, she marveled at the coolness of the floor. "Mom, what's for dinner?"
1232211.title: Rachel goes jogging

choices: Martha, your punishment-minded Mother
Rachel, your competitive fraternal twin
Olivia, your unstable little sister
13.content:
Your glanced over your bookshelf, and grabbed a biography you'd been meaning to read. Most of your small collection was, in fact, non-fiction. When your life is as crazy as yours, you don't need made up stories. You laughed a bit bitterly at the thought.

Propped up on your bed, you tried to lose yourself in someone else's life. Hours must have passed, because before you knew it, you could hear the mail truck pull up near your house. You snaked a finger through the blinds to get a peek at the mailman making his rounds, finally pushing a decent number of letters through your mail slot.

You turned back to your book, but something seemed to be buzzing in the back of your mind. What was it? The mail? Why would the mail bother you? What came in the mail?

Report cards.

You slacked during your last and final quarter of high school.

Oh, God no.

You leaped up out of bed and tore downstairs. Maybe, if you were lucky, you would be able to get there before anyone else. You could shred the card and pretend it got lost in the mail or something. You exploded into the living room, out of breath.

No luck at all. Someone was already bending down to grab the mail. Who was it?
13.title: Stay in your room: Poor choice?

choices: "Let's turn this into real torture."
"Let's make a game out of it."
131.content:
You stopped suddenly, gasping for air. Your mother turned and eyed you suspiciously.

"Why are you running through the house?" She asked quizzically, tilting her head to one side.

You racked your brain for something, anything, to distract her from the mail. She caught your nervous glances, however, and a smirk slowly grew upon her lips.

"Oooh, I get it," She looked down at the mail in her hands. "Something in the mail, huh? Sit down, young man."

"But..but I have to..."

"No buts. Sit. Down." Your mothers voice hit a tone which immediately dropped your back into a chair.

"Now let's see...credit card bill." She flipped the envelope away dramatically. "Utilities bill." She did it again. "Church mail-out." Another envelope in the air. You could swear she was taking more and more time between each piece just to torture you. "Hmm, oh-ho-ho, what do we have here? Report cards!" She held up three envelopes, one for each of the siblings still in school.

"Is this what you didn't want me to see?" She glared down at you, and did not break eye contact as she tore open the envelope with the nail on her index finger. She pulled out the paper and unfolded it in one flick of her wrist. "Oh...oh dear. This isn't good at all." She had barely looked at the paper, but you supposed your guilty face told her more than she needed to know.

She sat down next to you on the couch, turning slightly towards you. "You know this sort of performance isn't acceptable." Her almost comforting tone bled an aura of false sincerity.

"I..I know mom..." You turned your head, already anxious about the way she was looking at you.

"So, what do you suppose we should do about it?" She edged closer, ever so slightly.

"Um..I don't know..." You knew what was coming. Why did she have to play with you like this?

"I'm sure you can think of something. If you were me, what would you do?"

You sighed heavily, shuddering unconsciously. If you were her, you would do a lot of things differently, but you knew the answer she was looking for.

"I guess I should be punished..." The words pained you to say, but not as much as the next ones, "Just go ahead and shrink me, get it over with."

"Shrink you? Why, that's not at all what I was thinking." She put a 'caring' hand on your shoulder. You looked over and caught the terrifying predatory look on her face. "But, if that's what you suggest, how could I say no?"

"What? Mom, no, wait-" It was futile. In one smooth motion, you mother shoved you off the couch, and by the time you hit the floor, you were already bug sized. You laid there, somewhat dazed from the jarring shift in size and the fall which seemed to last too long. Your mother stretched out her legs, so that the heels of her large feet sat just above your head. They towered over your insect-sized form.

"Now then, you're shrunk, but that's not much of a punishment in and of itself. How can we turn this into an experience to learn from?"
131.title: Martha, your punishment-minded Mother

choices: Hide somewhere in the house.
Get the hell out of there, the outside world has to be better than this Hell.
1311.content:
Your mother tapped her foot, looking down on you from her place on the couch. She sighed deeply.

"You know what? I'm getting tired of this." She said, frowning at you, "I try and I try to teach you lessons, but you never seem to learn. It's getting embarrassing to call you my son."

"Mom, please, I'm sorry..." You'd never seen your mother quite like this. She could be sadistic punishing you, but she never seemed this exasperated.

"Don't lie to me, young man. If you were sorry, you wouldn't keep giving me reasons to discipline you. If you actually wanted to be treated like a member of this family, you'd act like one." She placed her feet on either side of your tiny body and flexed her large, wide toes. "Maybe that means it's time to cut you out of the family permanently."

"Wh-what? What does that mean?" You called out.

"You'll see..." Your mother glared, and then cupped her hands to her mouth, yelling out: "Giiiirls! Come down here, we have to talk."

You did not like where this was going one bit. You heard and felt the earthshaking stomping of your devious sisters marching into the room from opposite ends of the house. Your mother rose from her seat, stepped over you, and offered the couch to your sisters. They each look seats, Olivia on the left, Chelsea on the right, and Rachel in the center, her sweaty feet hovering just near your body.

"What's the deal, Mom? And where's the squirt?" Rachel asked.

"Your brother is at your feet." Your mother said.

"Oh perfect!" Rachel said, spotting you easily, "I was looking for a footstool" She lifted her foot, ready to bury you under her nasty foot flesh, but your mother interrupted.

"Not yet, dear. This is what we need to talk about." Your mom said, and Rachel's foot pulled away. "You see, your brother has brought home poor grades. Again. But since he doesn't seem to learn from his mistakes, even with our continuous punishments, I'm beginning to think he never will."

"Well duuuh," Olivia sneered, "He's as dumb as a bug. How could he possibly learn?"

"Good point, dear." Your mother smiled at your younger sister, who turned her head to stick her tongue out at you. You sighed heavily. Where was your mother going with this?

"And that's exactly what I was thinking." Your mother continued, "If your brother can't figure out how to act like an adult, even with our help, maybe it's time to stop treating him like an adult, like a member of this family, or even like a person."

"Mother, what are you getting at? Are we throwing him out? Because I can think of a better use for him than that." Chelsea said, eyeing your form and quirking her brow.

"Not quite, Chelsea. This is your brothers final punishment. After this family meeting, we will no longer treat him as anything more than an insect."

"What!?" You called out.

"This means we will not talk to him, or interact with him in anyway other than how we would deal with any other bug." She knelt down and picked up your body. Your sisters rose from their seats and looked down at you in your mom's hands.

"Seriously? You mean I won't have to hold back stomping on him?" Rachel asked, to which your mother nodded.

"This is fantastic." Chelsea said, flashing her tongue across her teeth, "He'd better hope I don't come across him with the vacuum."

"Exactly the kind of response I was hoping for." Your mother laughed deeply, looking down at you again. "After we finish this conversation, consider your humanity revoked. You're no longer my son." She paused for a moment, "How long do you think you'll last, hm? Will you end up squished under our shoes? Or maybe we'll find you crawling on the table and mash you into a napkin before throwing you out..."

"Or flushing him, if he's in the bathroom, right?" Olivia said.

"Of course, 'Liv." Your mother patted Olivia's head with her free hand, "Or maybe you'll get smashed into our toes, and end up washed down the drain when we shower."

"Or he'll fall off of our toes in our shoes, and be stuck under our feet until he's dead." Rachel snickered. "Face it, bug. You're not going to survive long."

"I would bet on that. But that's it for now. No more talking, no more family, no more being human. I hope for your sake you don't run into us again." Your mother said, giving you one last kiss. She then dropped you unceremoniously on to the floor. "Let's give him at least an hour to get used to his new status, hm?"

You laid on the floor dazed, watching your family file out of the room into different parts of the house. What the hell had just happened? How had you gone from human to insect, permanently, in less than half a day? They were absolutely serious about it too. You had better come up with some sort of plan soon, or you were going to end up dead. Or worse.
1311.title: Punishment: A Real Bug's Experience

choices: Stay here, more time to find a good hiding spot
You can't risk staying here, time to find a new place
13111.content:
While still shocked, you know that your time is limited. Going outside is tempting, but getting out will be hard. At about an inch, how can you possibly open the door, and who is to say that one of your former family members was not going to dispose of you as soon as you stepped to close to the door. All the windows had a screen that was shut, so getting out of them was not an option either. That leaves the question of where to hide. With less than an hour to hide, you would have to move fast to make it to a safe hiding spot. Your bedroom was upstairs, which would take more than an hour to reach at this size. In fact, the only possible rooms were the living room where you are now, the kitchen, the dining room, one of the bathrooms, or your mother's room.

You can hear some laughter from your soon-to-be hunters coming from what you believe to be the kitchen. Perhaps they are too caught up in the conversation to see you enter, if you go there. That is the best location for food and water after all. The dining room may have some small crumbs to eat. while the bathroom may have some water on the ground. However, both rooms lack the other vital good, so that would mean having to move around more at night in order to survive... survive, how crazy this all became because of a lousy stinking report card.

"Fifty minutes left before all buggies get what's coming to them!" Liv was more than happen to yell that as loud as she could, but it just made you realize just how little time you have.

Fifty minutes and still in the same spot where your mother dropped you, and still without an idea of where you will go and try to hide. You think about your mother's room and how big it was, plenty of nice spaces to hide. Sure it means traveling at night, but at least being spotted would be hard. The final option is this living room, where you already can see some crumbs left from past movies. Surely on the table there will be some condensation from cups that you could get when others were asleep, and at the very least, there were plenty of hiding spots that were off the floor, just in case Chelsea goes through with her threat of vacuuming...
Working out all the possibilities, you came to the conclusion that....
13111.title: Hide somewhere in the house.

choices: Under the cabinet, away from the family
To the cushions to try and sleep the day away
131111.content:
With not much time to run away, you stay in the living room and find a new place to hide. Hiding under the table is possible, but the chance of being seen or crushed under one of the giant feet. There is the cabinet with all the media. Under there is too small for for the vacuum to reach, which has lead to a great amount of dust bunnies. Insects in the past had the same idea though, you have seen a few crawl out of or into that space, and some may still be there, waiting for their next meal. The thought turns you pale, a cold sweat starting to build as the desperation peaks. Before you knew the torture would end without any major problems, but this was now life and death. If you live long enough maybe one of them will have mercy and let you live as a pet, slave, or even as your normal self. In the mean time though, those happy thoughts would have to wait.

Looking around, you find one more potential spot to hide... the couch. How many coins have gone missing inside that couch, surely hiding at the seems will allow for some comfort at least. If you dig down deep enough, then no one would be able to see you. You worried about being crushed into the cushion but remembered when an ant found its way onto the cushions a couple years ago. It survived just fine... until your sister, Rachel got a hold of it and crushed it under her foot playfully while having you watch in your shrunken demeanor besides it. As long as you don't try to come out for any reason though, you should be safe from the same fate. These seem like the best option for you. After hearing another outburst of laughter from your former family, you shudder and decide to finally take action. Out of the two options you see as the best possibility to survive, one was more to your liking.
131111.title: Stay here, more time to find a good hiding spot

choices: Even fate had some mercy
Some nightmares do come true
1311111.content:
With such little time left, and with a lot of your energy drained from the deadly denouncement of your humanity, you feel it best to just run under the cabinet. As you approach the towering piece of furniture, you can clearly see under it. At full size, it would appear to be a little dusty, with some dust bunnies, but at an inch, the perspective is filled with jagged terrain. The dust in the low sections seems up to your ankles, while the dust bunnies create bumps that are twice your size tall while appearing to be ten feet long. You figure that is not all bad, as they would give you something to hide under or behind to not be spotted. You cannot see any movement, and can only assume that if there was anything, you would be able to see a piece of it, or a web to a spider, if there was one.

As you venture into the dimly-lit area, your senses explode. The stagnant, dank air of an area untouched besides for the occasional breeze lingers. The smell of decay from old skin particles and hair only exasperating the unruly stench. The air is heavy, causing you to have to breath harder and faster than outside. Sounds of the now moving dust particles lingers around you, as do the once hard-to-hear settling of the wood and electronics above you. Your body soon tenses up, you can feel very tiny mites crawling on you momentarily before finding already dead skin to fester on. You know it will take time to get used to that sensation, but it is still better than being crushed onto a foot or flushed down the toilet between the sheets of crumpled toilet paper. It also makes you realize that at this size, even a simple dust mite may become your own pray to eat.

As you make your way to the far end of the cabinet, you can see one spider web to a small orb weaver that was currently in the middle of it. The corner it was in was clearly his, and not one you would venture into any time soon. The other corner seemed vacant, but you figured staying near the center of the underside of this cabinet would be best. Shifting dust away at first, you realize that this dust would make for a much more comfortable, albeit creepy at first, place to rest. Taking the rest of the time your former family gave you to get adjusted, you slowly but meticulously craft a bed out of hair and lint, then build a small but inconspicuous mound of dust ahead of you, in order to block out the wavering eyes of individuals looking to end your pathetic existence. You felt it a little redundant considering the other dust bunnies ahead of you, but you take no chances. Before you have a chance to realize how tired you were from all the stress, you pass out on your newly made bed, with nothing but dread still on your mind.
1311111.title: Under the cabinet, away from the family

choices: No! You're not ready to give up yet!
Yes...giving up is the only option.
13111111.content:
Your eyes opened at the earthshaking sensation of someone walking into the living room. You had no idea what time it was, or even what day it was, but you did know you had found a way to survive enough to rest. You pulled yourself up from your dust bed and looked down at it, reminiscing fondly over the memory of waking up in your own bed, your person bed. That was probably never going to happen again.

"Hey brotheeeeeer~" You heard Rachel sing. Your heart nearly burst out of your chest as you snapped your attention to the dim light fading from the far end of the cabinet, but there was no one there. You strained your eyes, and saw Rachel's bare feet in the middle of the living room, one foot on tip-toe, her heel bouncing expectantly. "Where aaaaare yoooou~" She continued.

You breathed out heavily, relieved you'd remained unspotted for the time being. Tentatively you moved closer to your new home's entrance, trying to keep an eye on your murderous sibling.

"Hmm, I wonder if you're even in here. I mean, you couldn't have gotten much further than here without being noticed." She said, pacing the floor, probably looking for you in the spaces between furniture. "But if you are, you really should just come out and submit to being squished under my feet. After all, what are you going to do, live like a bug for the rest of your life? Live in fear waiting for the day you'll be discovered? Eating the crumbs of your former family to live? What kind of life is that?"

You hadn't really thought too much into your own future, at this point. If your mother was serious about this, and it certainly seemed like she was, what were the rest of your days going to be like?

"Seems kind of silly to me. So I'll tell you what, come out right now and lay down at my feet, and you won't have to worry about anything anymore. Just let your big sister deal with everything." Rachel's voice was somewhere between predatory and protective, but the weirdest part was, she was starting to make sense. Maybe life at this size wasn't worth living.

"It'll only take a second. Just one step, really, and then it'll all be over..."

The words echoed in your head. 'All over.' You were tired, beaten, and honestly ready to give up. Do you give in and let your sister end it underneath her feet?
13111111.title: Waking up Alive, Better off Dead?

choices: You dodge it
Pins you on the ground
131111111.content:
Not wanting to give up you try to make a run for it on the right side of the cabinet,

“Not ganna happen little bug.”

you are then met by Rachel’s foot coming towards you over head...
131111111.title: Run for it !

131111112.content:
You couldn't believe you were doing this, but she was right. There was no point in living this sort of existence.

"If you're here, little brother, or should I say little ex-brother," Rachel giggled, "the offer stands for the next minute. After that, well, who knows what'll happen to you? I bet it won't be pretty though."

Your legs pushed you towards the light, which blinded you as you stepped past the threshold of your safe haven. You felt like a wind-up toy soldier, being pushed by forces beyond you, marching forward to certain death. Your eyes developed a cast of early tears as you wondered if that's all you ever really were.

"Oh, there you are!" Rachel grinned her awful, predatory grin, "I see you've come around to my way of thinking." She didn't take a single step towards you to narrow the gap. She wanted you to make the full journey. "Can't say I blame you. After all, now you get to die with at least a little dignity beneath your beautiful sister."

Further and further your clockwork legs carried you, until you were standing right at the base of your tower of a sister. You looked up at her, barely able to make out her face from the blue haze that always interrupts viewing at a distance.

"Well?" She questioned, eagerly wiggling her toes, "Go ahead. Lay down at my feet."

She really wanted the full thing, didn't she? She really wanted to obliterate any self-worth you had left before she obliterated you.

Your hands gripped tightly, as if every vestige of self-preservation you had left were rallying all at once. But it was too little too late. You hands relaxed, and as they did, so did your entire body. The overwhelming force of gravity pulled your figure into a tiny heap on the ground.

"There you go." She cooed, bending down and using her index finger to straighten out your askew limbs, "Any last requests?"

You looked her directly in her huge, terrifying eyes. "To live?"

You sister laughed. You almost wanted to laugh too.

"Afraid not, little brother. You've already decided to die. Can't take that back now, right?" Your sister raised herself up to her full, monstrous height, "And besides, this is something I really want. You wouldn't want to take that away from me, would you?"

"Now, are you ready to get flattened under these pretty feet?" She lifted her bare sole and wiggled her toes over you. The sweaty, stuffy scent that had tortured your entire life invaded your nostrils yet again.

You didn't even move, didn't twitch, as her titanic foot gingerly lowered on to you. Her mass came on as slowly as she could hold it back, but it was still like a freight train at your size. You could hear your sister, your awful, tyrannical, somehow perfect sister moan as she felt your body begin to give.

"Right where you belong, as always...completely powerless...about to collapse..." Her voice came out as a throaty sigh, "And I haven't really used any of my weight...but for the first time I can..."

"Bye buggy..." The words basically dripped from her mouth as she shifted her weight again. And suddenly it was over.

Your world went black as your body gave way under the incomprehensible panorama of Rachel.
131111112.title: Thanatos Urge: Giving up and Getting Crushed

13111112.content:
You are quickly awoken from your slumber by the booming steps of some of your former-family coming through the hallway into the living room you are currently hiding in. You hear one bunch of steps head towards the couch, another towards a wall for some reason, and a final set heading to the opposite side.

"The finder of a bug gets to determine what happens to it, right?" Rachel was very eager to find you, the sibling rivalry always being highest between you two, not that you ever stood a chance of being favored more than her."

"That is correct," Chelsea says in a matter-of-fact tone. "You just need to call out when you find one so the others can at least see what you choose to do."

Listening intently and trying to peak out the small crack for at least some hint at the individuals precise locations, all you could see what small, dainty feet belonging to your little sister, Liv make go onto the couch. A click is heard from the far wall, followed by a booming roar that no doubt belonged to the vacuum.
