You had plenty of time after all with your crazy murderous family asleep. They hadn't find you yet. . they never would now!! Your next plan would be getting some food, water, and shelter when you got outside. You weren't sure who to turn too. . maybe you could go to a neighbor's house and get their attention. Worse case scenario, you could live there in there house, eating their crumbs. Not a great life but one where you'd be free of your insane family.

As you walked forward you saw a piece of tape on the floor, you walked around it. Man, if you ran into that. . you might have gotten stuck to that. A real close one, you'd say. You kept making you way towards the front door, going past the kitchen and into the living room.

You had to go back to the living room and through the front door area to get to the front door again.

On your way out of the kitchen, you had also got to drink some water, your sister Olivia had dropped some soda on the floor and never picked it up so you got to drink a little of that. It was quite sour, you could taste the spit from your sister's mouth in it as you drank. Still, it was better than nothing.

After traveling for a little over an hour, you took a break. You were getting tired from traveling but kept some of the crumbs from the trash earlier. You rested underneath the sofa your mother would usual sit in and shuddered, remembering all the times she forced you to lick and kiss her feet. She always threatened to shrink you if you didn't do a good job and no matter how hard you tried. . you never were able to appease her. She always ended up shrinking you and mashing you under her foot after you were done.

One time she was so rough, she broke your legs. She actually shrank you done with your cast in place and forced you to crawl around on the floor while the family mocked you.

This time was different though, she was being so brutal, so calculating. You had to get out of this mess.

As you continued, you heard a creaking sound. It couldn't be!! One of them coming out! You rush a little deeper under the couch, not wanting them to see you.
131112112.title: Metal Gear Tiny

choices: You are able to stay awake.
You pass out, exhausted from everything that has happened to you.
Chelsea accidentally wakes up another member of the family!!
1311121122.content:
Looking up from under your sofa, you spotted Chelsea walking through. She yawned a bit, still a bit tired. It seemed she had never went to bed in the first place, probably staying up all night. You had to lay low, it was your only chance of survival. You moved away from under the sofa and a bit more towards the chair knob.

One time, Chelsea once reenacted the Carthaginian infant sacrifices with bugs. .while making you be the "high priest" when you were shrunken down! As "high priest" you had to eat from the carcasses of those dead bugs. It was pretty terrible.

Shaking your head, you realized you had to get back into the action. Looking back up from your hiding place you saw that Chelsea was. . . gone?

Where had she. .

Wooosh!!!

Suddenly you felt yourself moving upward in an incredibly fast motion! Your tiny body was being picked up!

"Ah, there you are!!" Chelsea said, bringing you up to her gigantic face. "Looks like I'm the one who found you."

You looked at Chelsea's freckled face. She had some bags under her eyes, you probably did too. When you were hiding earlier you didn't exactly sleep very well. Or at all, really.

You watched in terror as your sister opened her gigantic mouth wide, sticking you inside of it. Her hot warm breath washed over you as you felt yourself start to get compressed gently. Mashing you between her lips, she started to suck on you like a mint. You screamed because she was sucking so hard it was hurting your teeny tiny body.

SQUIRCH! SQUELCH! SQUIRCH!!

She stopped sucking quite that hard and started to suck you softly, gently. It actually felt nice on your body which made you feel uncomfortable given that it was your sister and you didn't know when she would suck harder again. You just wanted her to finish you already but it seemed she had some torment in mind first.

Walking into the kitchen, the giantess opened up the fridge, pulling out a cheese stick and some juice. As she did this she started humming a tune from one of the shows she liked to watch but you couldn't make it out cause the vibrations of noise was hurting your ears,

Ignoring your plight, your sister poured herself a glass of juice and with the cheese stick and the juice in hand, made her way back to her room. She continued her sucking of your body but she was once again gentle. Maybe she didn't mean to suck on you so harshly earlier. The sounds of her feet falling into the ground combined with her gentle sucking was actually quite relaxing.

WHAM!

Squirch! Sqelch! Squirch!

WHAM!

Squirch! Sqelch! Squirch!

WHAM!

Squirch! Sqelch! Squirch!


The stomping and rhythmic stomping of her feet started to make you feel tired. You hadn't slept at all lately. . you pushed against her lips as the sucked on you, both trying to make yourself uncomfortable and also trying to stay awake. You were worried that if you feel asleep, you'd wake up inside of Chelsea's stomach! Or worse. . .
1311121122.title: A Sucker for Chelsea

choices: You submit, getting on the alter and bow down before your Goddess.
You rebel,running for it. It was your only hope.
You freeze, all of this being too much for you. You've totally gone in shock.
13111211221.content:
You were exhausted, tired, and ready to pass out. Struggling inside of Chelsea's mouth, you can feel her tongue and mouth start to move you around a bit. She once again started to suck on you in a very rough way. . repeatedly putting tons of pressure on your tiny body.

The pain was rough as you felt your skin start to pull all over, it was like getting an indian burn on your whole body as she sucked super hard on you. You couldn't even breathe due to how hard she sucked.

She stopped for a second, stealthily opening her bedroom door as you gasped for air and relief at the same time. A thought crossed your mind, maybe you could jump from here. . jump and plummet yourself down to the ground. You wouldn't live but you'd be out of this horror show. Those thoughts went away as you saw Chelsea sit down, now sucking on you again but once again in a gentle ton as she sat in front of a tiny replica of. . . oh no. . .

An Aztec Pyramid?

You saw past her bed, bookshelf, and other arrangements that she had a small replica of an Aztec Pyramid on her desk. You remember her buying that awhile back at an antique shop, but the fact that she had it there and finished. . .

Before you could react further, you felt a hard sucking as you were thrust deep into Chelsea's mouth. This was it. . she was going to swallow you now!! You were terrified as everything went dark as you were pulled back away from the light and further down onto her tongue. Her spit culminated in the whole area, it was very hard to breathe and you were totally soaked. Closing your eyes you hoped that you would pass out before you hit her stomach at least. .

Woosh!!

Suddenly, Chelsea spit you out really fast, you opened your eyes to see her open hand cupped and ready for you as you. . .

Splat!

landed. . onto her hand, a little bruised but no worse for the wear. You turned and looked at your sister, freckled and with her hair a bit disheveled. Placing you on top of the pyramid, you noticed a small alter on the top. . small enough for you to fit on top of!! As you worriedly noticed this, Chelsea had placed her juice next to the pyramid and opened up her cheese stick and started to gently chew on it while she looked at you.

"C-chelsea. . L-listen. . " you started to say as loud as you could. "J-just cause you are supposed to t-treat me this way. . y-you don't have to. . "

You were desperate to get her not to hurt you but it seemed your response fell on deaf ears, whether she didn't hear you or ignored you. . you weren't sure. She just stared at you blankly as she took another bite of her cheese stick.

Chomp, munch, munch, munch. Chomp, munch, munch, munch.

Seeing the devastation that her mouth was doing to that little bit of food frightened you. You realized that could have been you a little while ago. Still covered with her spit, you used your hands to rub your body in a vain attempt to get some of it off.

Taking one final bite, Chelsea finished eating her cheese stick, reaching for her orange juice that she had gotten earlier. Juice and cheese was a strange combination that you didn't fully get, but it definitely was a "Chelsea" thing. As she started to chug down the juice, you started looking around. Maybe there was some way you could get out of this mess, jump and hide somewhere to get away from her. At your size, it was quite a number of stairs to get down from this thing. . more than enough time for her to just grab you again. Still, it might be your only chance.

She took a deep breath and sighed contentedly from the fulfillment her little snack had been. . and returned her attention to her little bug instead.

"Do you know why the Aztec's believed in human sacrifice?" she said, her huge hand coming into view as it gently rubbed your body.

"Why they believed killing so many people was, believe it or not, actually a good thing."

Pushing you towards the alter, you started to scream at her, tears filling your eyes as you were wildly looking for some way out of this mess. You pushed, prodded, begged, and pleaded as you were slowly pushed towards that alter on top of the pyramid.

"See, the Gods, they gave the Aztec's everything. Good crops, fertility, success, everything. Everything was owed to them. so what a way to give back. . a way to give back to the gods. . then to give them. . everything."

You continued to push against her, yelling at her at the top of your lungs. Suddenly you felt excruciating pain as her finger started to mash you against the surface of the pyramid.

"You are going to stop fighting me right now."

She didn't yell it, didn't scream it, just spoke in a general casual voice but you stopped. Stopped moving, screaming, fighting and she stopped pushing so much pressure on you from her finger.

"Isn't that kind of funny? You know, in a way, I am your God. So, you owe me everything. All of you, every last bit of you. You owe it all to me. When I saw you in the living room, I could have just crushed you. Smashed you, eaten you. Ripped you limb from limb. I didn't though, did I?"

Breathing very hard, you felt such a powerful wave of anxiety. What was going on with this? On the one hand, she was right that she hadn't killed you. . immediately. But that didn't mean that she still wouldn't do it to you.

The finger came off of you and Chelsea looked down at you more intently. She was still tired but she had a devious mile to her as her hazel eyes pierced into your soul. She did feel like a Goddess right now.

"Get on that alter and bow down to me. Do it now."

Getting up, you started shaking. Staring up at her, you realized you had a big decision to make.
13111211221.title: What do you owe a Goddess?

choices: Olivia
Rachel
Martha
13111211223.content: Who does she wake by mistake?
13111211223.title: Chelsea accidentally wakes up another member of...

choices: Into the trash, you go!
She notices something in the pile. . .
13111212.content:
Time passed slowly as your mother and sisters discussed how they would end your existence. It was a grueling time as you listened to all sorts of terrible ways to torture you. You had almost given up on ever leaving this spot, until you heard a loud buzzing sound coming from your mother's cell phone.

Rachel jumped up gleefully and shouted loudly in the room so you could hear too.

"Time's up!! I guess it is time to go bug hunting!!"

The group of women got up off of the couch and began to scour about the room. Olivia started to leave to check the hallway leading towards the bedrooms, but she was called back by her mother.

"Olivia!"

"Don't worry, mom! If I find him first, I promise to call all of you so you can watch me squish him!!"

"No dear, that is not why I called you back!! Can you clean up the kitchen?!? The floor is getting a bit dirty with all those food particles from before!!"

Olivia's face turned into one of disgust and annoyance. She put her arms down angered and crossed them afterwards.

"Oh, but mom. . . you all are going to find him first!!! I want to get rid of the litle bug!"

Martha shook her head and pointed towards the dining room area.

"Now now, it'll be alright!! If we find him first, I'll come and get you too! Besides, maybe he is in the kitchen!!"

"Ah, mom!!! He wouldn't be that stupid to hide in there!! There is no way he could escape from there!!"

Martha walked over, her other daughters already off in search of a little bug and handed Olivia a broom. She smiled as Olivia finally had come around to cleaning up in the kitchen. But, she also agreed with Olivia, it was unlikely that he had gone into the kitchen. Though, given how dumb he was who knew? Maybe Olivia would find him.

Martha went towards the front door, she thought that he might have tried to leave the house. Even if he did, it was unlikely that he would get very far. She would find him and end him.

As you listened and watched the events unfold, you realized that you had made a terrible mistake. On the one hand, you had at least gotten in some food. Now though, you were trapped as Olivia had begun to sweep up the floor into a big pile. As she did this, she began humming an annoying tune. Some kind of. . . song she had heard or something. It was annoying and so incredibly loud in your ears due to your smal size.

Wham!!

The broom slamed down besides where you were as Olivia pushed the contents of the floor closer to the center of the room. She was doing this so absentmindedly that you doubted that she even was paying attention to what she was doing!!

WHOOM!

The broom crashed right behind you! You turned around to see her giant body looming above you, the simple song still going as you were swept towards a giant (to you) pile of dust and food!! You screamed as your body slammed into it.

Meanwhile, Olivia had retrieved the dustpan, happy to have the work done quickly. It might not have been the best job she had ever done, but now she could get back to looking for the little lost bug. She pulled the pile into the dustpan and brought it over towards the trash can.
13111212.title: Someone decides to sweep up the dining room.

choices: The trash rips and it all dumps out!!
You and the garbage make it to the curb.
131112121.content:
Olivia hummed as she stepped back and forth in the dining room. As she moved, she rocked the trash you were in back and forth, over and over again. The piles of dust and sot saturated your naked body, turning your skin totally black. This could actually come in handy as it would be harder for your murderous family to try and kill you. Your body went up and down continuously as Olivia's unknown torture of you continued. Olivia was hoping on every speck left in the kitchen, in the hopes that one of them would crunch underneath her massive feet. It was like a dance to her, a dance that might bring about your death!! She never was that great of a dancer, although she was also only 14.

You needed to do something and fast, time was running out. As soon as Olivia brought you towards the trash container, you would be in big trouble. Pounds upon pounds of trash would crush your body, a horrible fate. You couldn't let that happen.

Rachel spotted Olivia's goofiness from the living room. She stopped the bug hunt momentarily to go see what she was up too. You heard her booming footsteps as she slowly made her way into the room.

“Olivia, what are you doing in there? You are acting like a child!! Don't you remember that we are on a mission here?!?”

Olivia turned and smiled. She was having a good time and had actually sort of forgotten about the bug she wanted to squish. You watched as she still held you; her face changing from happy to serious.

With a quick burst, Olivia bolted from the front part of the kitchen towards the trash bag!! She was moving at such a rapid pace that you were having trouble from flying into the air. Luckily or unluckily, the trash on the dustpan was doing a good job of keeping you in place. With one little twist, Olivia thrust the dirt and sot and poured you into the open bag!! You screamed as you flew deep down. . falling farther and farther into the horribly smelling container.

Whap!!

You landed on an old banana peal that broke your fall. The other trash was also coming down. Diving down into the garbage, you made your way towards the bottom, til you could see out the white trash bag. Up above, in the land of giants, Olivia had sealed the bag and was starting to take it outside. This might be your chance to escape. Your family would never be able to find you now!!

RIP!!

You heard a terrible sound and knew immediately what it was. The bag was tearing at the corner! If it tore before Olivia got you off at the curb, you would fall out with a ton of other garbage!! It wouldn't be good, not one bit!!
131112121.title: Into the trash, you go!

choices: The three girls start cleaning up the mess.
A knock at the door interrupts the commotion.
1311121211.content:
"Da da daaa!! Da da daaaa!!! Da daa daaaa da daa da daa da daaaa!!!"

You covered your ears. The trash wasn't the most terrible thing about what was going on right now. The worst part was the humming. Olivia's loud obnoxious humming as your tiny anxious body tensed up in fear. You looked at the hole as a little drops of food and trash slightly fell out of the bottom of the bag. It wouldn't be long now, hopefully Olivia would make it to the can outside before it happened. The ripping increased as the trash got closer and closer to pouring out like a waterfall. You were terrified at what would happen if you fell. All the garbage in the bag would most likely crush you or worse. . .

You were afraid, you didn't want to die, not like this. Not like a piece of garbage. Suddenly the bag stopped, your world shifted as you were flung backwards into an old banana peal.

"Liv, when you finish up with that trash, you are more than welcome to help us look for the bug, okay?!?"

"Yaay!! Ok, I'll hurry up and take it outside!!"

Olivia did a quick twirl then jumped up and down in excitement as she approached the front door. You got up off of the banana peal and looked at the hole again. This was it!

Rip!!!

Your mind was elsewhere when the bag actually tore. Part of you tried to imagine that this was all a dream, not real. You heard a loud yelp sound emitting from your sister's mouth as all the tons of trash poured into the front hallway in front of the door. Your mother leaped out of the way to avoid getting all the trash all over herself. It was a big mess. You flung out slowly, moving down like a conveyor belt. Olivia tried to use her hands to stop the spill, but that only put pressure on the other sides, causing the trash to fall out faster. You rolling with it. You were now totally covered with trash, with no way to escape. The only thing that kept you from getting crushed was the banana peal from earlier. It shielded you and propped up the other trash on top of you.

"Liv!! What did you do!!" your massive mother said frustrated at the horrible mess littering the floor. She paced quickly to the kitchen, struggling to pull out the broom your sister had left there.

Your other sisters stormed into the room too, curious at the ruckus.

"Oh, Olivia!! You always have to be spoiled, don't you?!? That isn't going to get you many heavenly rewards!!" Chelsea said matter of factly, her loud voice booming in the front hallway.

"Knock it off, Chelsea!! You know I didn't do it on purpose!!"

"Olivia!!" your mother interrupted.

"You can't leave all that on the floor!! You think just one bug is bad, wait til we get a bunch of them!! And those bugs are way more capable than our current guest, they can bite!! And Chelsea, you want to comment, then you get to help!!"

"Aww, but mom. . ."

"Isn't there a verse about honoring your parents in there?!?"

"Yeah. . . okay!! Move over, Olivia!!"

You laid silently, listening to a ruffling of replacement bags and the three women gathering around the trash. You heard some footsteps walking away too, which you assumed was Rachel, still looking for you. You laid silently and wondered what to do next.
1311121211.title: A Small Mess

choices: Make a run for it!!
Stay and go outside with the garbage.
13111212111.content:
Whoom!!

You cringe as a mountainous amount of trash is lifted up above you and placed into a white plastic trash bag. Your enormous sister Chelsea towered overhead, looking grossed out from picking up the trash particles with her hands. Some of the pieces of the particles got stuck, which resulted in her shaking her hands and raining down piece of the trash on top of you. You carefully placed it above you, in an attempt to conceal yourself from these terrifying women. You didn't want them to see you.

"Chelsea, stop making those faces!! You don't hear Olivia complaining about this!! I am picking it up with my hands too!!"

"I know, mom, I know. . . its just so. . . unclean!!" Chelsea complained "and just . .. icky!!"

"As soon as we finish, we can get back to hunting for the little bug!!" your mother nonchalantly stated.

You needed to come up with a plan here. At this rate, in a few minutes, these towering giants would find you and crush you into non-existence!! There had to be some way to escape from them, you just were not sure how. The loud thunderous roar of trash being lifted from the ground and put into the bags was terrifying to hear. Still, maybe there was a way you could escape.

WHAM!!

A giant's hand collided right into you!! You tried to look up, but your head was slammed onto the rough linoleum. Trying to right yourself, you struggled under the weight of the mighty fingers as they dragged themselves upwards and towards the trash bag. You looked up at the giant face who held you. Chelsea!! She looked at you casually, not realizing that you were right in her hand. If you made any sudden motion, you might give away your position. If you can get into the bag she had, you could get outside and by the curb. From there, you'd just need to make your way to someone else's house for help.

"Eeeeeek!!!"

Chelsea screamed, launching the trash she was holding upward and back into the other trash. You landed on an empty pizza box and slipped through the cracks inside. It was actually a decent hiding spot.

"Liv, fu. . ehh. . shoot. You almost made me swear, Olivia!! That wasn't funny!!"

Olivia and your mom laughed as your sister had spooked Chelsea by tickling her bare feet with feathers.

"It is kind of your fault, Chelsea!! Why would you come into this pile with no shoes, anyway." Olivia mocked, still chuckling a bit.

"I don't want to get my nice shoes dirty in all of this mess!! Besides, I am only cleaning it because of you, anyway!!"

"Stop fighting, you two!! We are almost done, now!! Let's just wrap it up!!"

Your mother picked up the pizza box and quickly moved it towards the bag. You flew out of it and landed on some of the remaining soot that Olivia was picking up. Picking your head up, you started at Olivia's magnificent body as it loomed above you. She had been pushing the dirt together with her feet. She had also, at Chelsea's request, removed her shoes and was using her bare feet to push it all together. Looking over, you noticed some small crevices to the side of the wall. With your body soaked with the soot, maybe you could make it over without them noticing.
13111212111.title: A dirty boy

choices: She alerts her daughters.
She decides to take care of you, by herself.
131112121111.content:
It was just far too risky to be handled by these mighty titaness'!! You had to escape now. If you could make your way towards one of the cracks in the wall, you could make your way to safety. At this point, it was your only hope. If these three giantess' found you. . . you were finished!!

The remaining trash had been pooled into one final area. Three smaller filled bags were sitting behind three giantess'. You blinked as you saw Olivia tying her bag up and carefully taking it towards the door behind.

"Be careful with that, honey!! We don't want another spill."

"Ugh, I will be careful, Mom!!"

"Don't sass your mother, Liv!! I can have you punished in other ways for back talking!!"

Chelsea let out a little giggle but stifled her laughter when her mother looked at her disapprovingly.

While the giants quarreled, you started to slowly move out of the final trash pile. With your mom's view on Olivia and the latter focused on the trash, it would give you the opportunity you needed to get out of there.

BOOM!!!

You almost had a heart attack when Chelsea's giant bare foot crashed into the remaining pile of garbage. It spun out a few more pieces throughout the room. . including you!!

"Oh Chelsea, now look!! You got those trash pieces all over!!"

"Mom. . I was just. . trying to compress it all for ease of disposal. I'm not the one who made this mess. . " Chelsea said solemnly as she eyed Olivia. Olivia stuck her tongue out at her older sister as she opened the door and headed for the trash can to finally get rid of all this. Your mother had handed Olivia the second trash bag, meaning once Chelsea put the final trash together, they would be done and back to hunting.

You froze as you found yourself dangerously close to your mother's enormous feet. She was always careful of her surroundings and what was happening to her. If anyone would notice you running, it would be her. Maybe it would have been better to let Olivia grab you instead of this.

Martha reached down and picked up three of the five final pieces of soot covered residue from the ground. They stuck to her hand easily, so she just poked them with her fingers. Moving over to the fourth piece, she poked it and lifted her hand to the air. . .only for it to stay stuck on the ground? Trying again, she poked it a second time, still very lightly. That is when she heard it.

A teeny tiny cough emitting from your body. The poke had been tiny for her, but knocked out your air the second time. The giantess mother knew immediately who it was.

It was you!!

Her eyes grew wide with realization. You were in trouble now!!
131112121111.title: The Fateful Run

choices: The girls like that idea
the girls fight over you
other
1311121211111.content:
"GIRLS!!" Your mother yelled, "COME HERE! I FOUND HIM!"

You heard heavy tromping, as all the girls rushed in, wanting to get off on seeing you cornered, and at their mercy.

Olivia was the first to speak tauntingly. "HAHA! LOOK AT THAT LOSER! WHAT'S THE MATTER, BUG? SCARED BECAUSE YOUR CORNERED BY 8 DIRTY FEET? HAHA! YEP, YOU GUESSED IT! ANY ONE OF US WILL MAKE YOU SUFFER LONG AND HARD BEFORE WE KILL YOU!"

"NOW, HOW ABOUT WE PLAY A TOURNAMENT OF ROCK, PAPER, SCISSORS TO SEE WHO GETS TO HAVE HIM FIRST?
1311121211111.title: She alerts her daughters.

choices: She wants to deal with you, herself.
She hides you for her daughters to find.
1311121211112.content:
Your mother smiled widely at the realization that the piece of trash hiding in front of her was you. She had actually been quite amused. What a way to try and survive! Hiding in the trash as it was about to be taken outside. It was a bit clever for a bug. Sure, you were useless to her, but you had at least provided an excellent little challenge of finding you. Carefully reaching down, she positioned two of her fingers besides you and gently lifted you high into the air.

Woosh!!

You rose in front of your mom's face as she smiled a bit bigger this time. Your heart sank. This was it. . .she was about to destroy you with one final pinch between her fingers. Only. . . she didn't. What was she waiting for?

Carefully, she brought you towards her blouse and. . deposited you safely in her pocket. What was this? She was hiding you. . .from your other siblings? Why the help? More than likely, she had some other kind of devious torture planned before she disposed of you. You didn't even want to think about that, as you struggled in the pocket. It was very large inside and behind you, you felt your mother's breast push upwards against you. It was very soft and actually comfortable. The only other residents with you inside of the pocket was some lint . . possibly from the dryer or something. You were pretty far down and it would be quite the climb to move upwards. Maybe if you used the lint, then you could at least move up.

Finally, the women finished cleaning up the entire floor, it was finally spotless.

"Excellent work, girls!! You see what obedience brings. Excellent results!!" She shook her hand back and forth, wiping a little of the dust away.

"Can I go looking for the bug, now!!" Oliva said super excited.

"Of course, honey!! You girls can keep looking without me, though. I'm a little tired and want to take a nap later. Don't even wake me, if you find the bug!! Just take care of it. . okay!!"

The girls smiled, laughed, and nodded their heads. Chelsea began whispering something to Olivia. While Martha couldn't exactly make it out, she got the jist of it. They were planning on keeping you alive, but torturing you for awhile first before killing you, instead of just killing you like she had wanted them to do. Martha got a big smile on her face. That was so like her daughters. Thinking outside of the box instead of limiting their potential. It made her really proud. Although, she had planned to actually torture you while she was in her room, then dispose of you. . maybe she could 'hide' you in a place where her daughters could do it instead. Sort of a reward for being so good. She thought it over a bit before deciding. . .
1311121211112.title: Playful mother

choices: The execution begins.
Martha has another idea.
13111212111121.content:
As she walked past her daughters looking frivolously for the bug that she was now carrying in her breast pocket, Martha thought a little more. On the one hand, her kids had been good. . but they had also argued and fought amongst each other when she asked them to clean up the mess that Olivia had made. Although. . . it probably wasn't even her. It was probably this little bug, stupidly trying to get out too early. Perhaps, she had given the bug too much credit.

While he did make for an amusing distraction, that is all he was good for. . .a distraction. Giving her daughters him to play with could get them too used to things like that. How would they get into a good job or find a good husband if they were focused on torture. Besides, she had planned to teach them all how to shrink people. . just like she had learned from her own mother, too. It was just the way her family would be. A true matriarchal society at its best.

A smile on her face, she had made up her mind. She would deal with the little one, herself. Besides, she had brought him into this world, it was only fitting that she take him out. She carefully opened the door to her bedroom, gave her searching children a wave, and entered into the room.

For you, you had been tumbling back and forth in your mother's breast pocket the entire time. It was strange and frustrating to be smacked by the cloth and feeling the weight of her breasts mashing at you, over and over!! You needed to get away from her, she was far too crazy for you to be able to reason with. Yet know that she had found you, you were not sure you could. You heard a door shut, your mother must have been in her bedroom, right now!!

After closing the door, Martha found herself getting a bit excited. There was something special about delivering a punishment, but whenever she had to deliver a 'fatal' punishment, it was always really great. She remembered the first time it happened too. She was 16 and her brother had gotten really terrible grades. He had to completely repeat a grade. Her own mother was furious, and as usually she shrank him down. He pleaded and begged as she tortured him in all sorts of gruesome ways. She only wish her mother had let her see. Finally, she took him out and called for Martha to come to the kitchen.

"What is it, mom?" She remembered so vividly asking.

Her mother produced her own brother and told her that he was no longer apart of this family. She handed him to her and told her that she knew what to do. She remembers seeing him look up into her eyes, so small and helpless. He was pleading, on his knees, hoping that she would spare him. He looked really bruised, there were cuts on his body that looked like fingernails. Also a big gash on his forehead that he was struggling to keep the blood from coming down. He was worthless. Her mother was so proud when she balled him into a fist and watched as his body exploded into blood and guts into her hand. She didn't even bother to wipe it off. . in fact she liked looking at it. She even licked some of his remains. They tasted great.

"Such fond memories", Martha thought as she reached into her breast pocket and pulled out her own little son. You fell down onto your knees and looked up at her with great fear and anticipation.

She smiled at you.

You watched silently and in fear as your mother stomped around the room, her face looking happy and blissful. She had this look of happiness and self righteousness plastered on her face. You knew that she was thinking about how she was right and what she was doing was justified. There was no good intent written on her face, and only a 'just' expression that she had. You needed to find a way to get far far away from her, as she would brutalize you!!

You remembered one time, you had gotten in so much trouble at school, they they wanted you to clean up all the bathrooms in the school. It was. . well, kinda your fault, as you did set the pipes to overload. You didn't even know how they had found out, you had done a good job of covering your tracks. You knew that your mother would be furious, and since she could shrink you. . that would be how she would punish you.

What she actually did, surprised you. She told you to get into her car and together, the two of you marched to the school and to the principal. Martha argued and argued with the principal, showing him that he had no evidence that it had been you, that he was using you as a scapegoat, and it was probably the faulty plumbing in the school.

You had never seen a man look so broken as the principal that day. You got off, scot free. As you both drove back together, you started to thank your mother before she cut you off.

"No, no, no!! I know it was you!! I just couldn't have you spending all that time at the school. How else am I going to punish you for what you did!!"

You cringed as your mother shrank you as she drove back home. There, you endured one of the worst punishments in your life. She taped you to the toilet paper roll and left you there. Your entire family used you as toilet paper for the whole weekend. The only water and food you got was from the feces and toilet water that you had been rubbed against. Never had you felt so incredibly low.

Finally, she snapped out of her trance. The entire time she had this malicious neutral appearance on her face. When she looked at you, she didn't just stare, she smiled!

Bringing you over to her desk, she casually plopped you on the surface.

"Well, now now now!! I found you, but that means I get to decide how to deal with you!! Now. . how should I treat such a bad. . bad little boy!!"

You shivered and shook as you stared at her with terror.

BAM!!

Your mother's giant fist slammed besides you, knocking you down onto the desk. Putting your hands up, your mother picked her hands up and laughed maniacally. As she laughed, she brought a nearby chair over and put it in front of you. She slowly got ready to sit, so you decided to stand up again and. .

SLAM!!

Your mother quickly sat back down and slammed her other fist beside you, knocking you back down onto the desk and off your feet.

"Did I tell you that you could get up!! Did I give you permission to do this?!?"

You tensed up, fear filling up your bones. This was worse than when she actually did things. She was just pacing, letting you imagine a thousand different scenarios as you broke down more and more. You just wanted her to end this already.

"Now. . . I have decided to let you live. . IF!!!"

She saw you looking a little bit happy and she didn't want that. Her giant finger prodded your face as she pushed down on you.

"If. . you do the next thing I ask you. . and well!!"

You cringed. . wondering what it was.

1311122.content:
With so little hiding places, all of which either easily checked or hard to get to in short time, you make a move for it, even if that puts you right underneath your former-family's presence. You take a deep breath and venture out trying to block out the conversation as much as possible, but it is hard to ignore it all. By the time you were nearly in the kitchen, your heart sank at the new topic. "So what are we going to do with the bug's bedroom now?" Olivia's voice now clear as day, with more than a touch of eagerness to it.

Her room was originally an office room, so it was a little smaller than yours with no closet for all her clothes. On more than one occasion while being tortured by her in her room, you could see that she had piles of clean clothes, and were well acquainted with the fact she had a growing pile of dirty clothes. You were truly nothing to her now, she did not even try to fake any sympathy before, but now it hit you harder.

"Sorry Liv dear," your mother said with a little sympathy in her voice," but we need to wait at least a few months before we do anything. When the police come to investigate, we have to make it look like he ran away on his own accord. When the news and police die down enough we can make it look like we just started to move on, and then we will decide what to do." You mother could not help but sound cheerful, and even though you could not see it, you could tell there was a smirk on her face.

Your mother, the one who denounced you as even human, already had a plan with what to do next. You feel your heart beat race, as your chest tightens up until it feels empty. Still, you made your decision to move, and you have to continue. As you step into the vast kitchen you can see the four of them sitting at the smaller table with room for four, six if you cram. They were sitting relaxed, Rachel and your mother both sitting cross legged as they did when they were enjoying themselves. past them was the island where the family kept the pans and where the sink was. On the side facing the outside wall, there was the dishwasher and other cabinets where plates, silverware, and the like were located. The dishwasher had a small panel on the bottom that did not quit reach the floor, which would allow you one place to hide for the most part. The cabinets were almost always shut, but they too jutted off the floor, leaving a quarter inch wide, eight of an inch deep, gap between the floor and the rest of the cabinet frame. You could potentially hide under there with the only chance of being crushed if they saw you and got lucky with aiming a thin magazine or similarly thick and "heavy" object into the crevice. Your mind starts to wonder, as you recall that in one of those same cabinets, pesticides and other chemicals were located too, and you could only hope you did not have to experience what they would do to your diminutive form now that you were nothing but a pest in the house.

The refrigerator was on the adjoining wall, and that would be a great place to hide. There was ample room underneath, scraps always end up underneath, and with a little luck, it should be moist enough to drink from the underbelly of the gargantuan structure. It may be loud underneath, but the noise would be worth it for those luxuries. As with other structures, you do fear some insects are underneath. The house was far from dirty, unfortunately for you, but as with any structure, insects can and do get in from time to time, and what a perfect place for them to call home too. You can only tell by going there though, so now it was time to head over to see which of these locations would work best.

As you start to cross the open floor, you pray that they pay no mind to you. "Ew," Olivia says loudly as to get the attention from everyone, "it is the giant bug!" As your luck that day has it, your wish is not granted as you look up to see everyone eying you. You once again turn pale as you try to make a run for it faster than ever. Your fate depends on whether or not your full hour is granted, or if they decide to end it here and now.

You turned, shocked to hear another giant so early. This ‘hour’ that they had given you was turning less and less into no time. Reeling your head upward, you saw your giant sister, Rachel staring down at you. With one hand on her hip, she leaned gently in your direction.

“Chelsea said that you decided to just stay out in the open, but I couldn't believe it!! I thought. . .surely a little bug is smart enough to at least try and hide!! But no. . .we get the stupid bug!!”

BOOM!!

Rachel took a step into the front hallway towards the open door, knocking you down and onto the rubber. Even without any shoes, Rachel’s foot falls were enough to really have an impact on you up close. You suspected your size had something to do with that too. You bounced upward and back onto the rubber strip. The crash hurt your head and body, but it also hurt something else. Your fall made a hole in the insulation!! Thank you, Rachel!!

BOOOM!!

Before you could react, you fell backwards a bit more from another terrifying stomp. Looking upward, you saw the giant face of your terrifying twin sister staring down upon you. She cocked her head to one side, a large grin plastered on her face.

“Where do you think you are going, buggy!?! You think that you can get outside and get help!! Ha!!”

BOOOM!!!

BOOOOM!!!

BOOOOM!!!

Rachel began to pace around you in a circle, her large bare feet ominously getting just slightly closer with each step. Racing a mile a minute, your heart was beating so fast that you had to put your hand on your head. Your blood pressure wasn't probably doing so good either with all of these close encounters.

“You are far too small and stupid to be able to do anything out there, buggy boy!! No, you’d just get eaten or stepped on outside too!!”

BOOOM!!!

BOOOOM!!!

BOOOOM!!!

“No. . your place is here, with your family!! In fact, you need to feed my hungry bare foot!!”

Being careful not to accidentally crush you, Rachel brought her enormous left food super close to your minuscule body. You could smell the sweat and funk coming from her giant foot. It was horrifying. Her toe pushed itself right at you too!! Reacting instinctively, you reached out and hugged it with your hands and body, to prevent it from knocking you over.

“Ha!!! See!!! You two were made for each other!! It’s love at first step!!”

Rachel lifted her foot slightly in the air, bringing your little body with it. Moving slowly to the left and right, she gave you a little ‘foot ride’ as you felt more and more dizzy just from the little movement.

“You should be glad that your hour isn't up yet!! If I were Liv or Chelsea, they would have totally crushed you by now!! I, on the other hand, believe in giving a person. . .or bug, a chance!!

With a hard wham, Rachel launched you off of her foot and towards the wall. Again, you hit the rubber insulation in a different spot. It was good that you did, because a kick like that would have normally killed or totally immobilized you. The rubber took most of the blow.

“Don’t go dying too early, you little freak!!”

BOOOM!!!

BOOM!!!

BOOM!

BOOM

Boom

boom!

You watched, on the floor, as Rachel walked away. It was actually a good thing that it wasn't Liv pestering you. You might need your mom’s intervention to survive something like that. Although, that wasn't entirely too good either. Wiping off your forehead, you get yourself back up and start to look at that front door again.

Checking your body for serious injuries (just considerably more bruises) you make your way towards the now open insulation space. Carefully you slide yourself down. . moving underneath the giant crack of the front door.

This was it!! You were finally free!!

Your eyes grew wide as soon as you stepped out from underneath the door.

Another door!!

How could you not have thought about this. The entry door in front of the front door!! It also had another insulator below!! You had wasted so much time!! Your mother had been right. 45 minutes had passed, leaving you with a measly 15 minutes left!! And out here, you would be a sitting duck. Now what!?!?
1311211.title: Berated Belittlement

choices: You go back underneath the front door.
You risk it all and go into the living room.
13112112.content:
You felt like you were going to have a heart attack. Everything you had done. . ruined in a single moment!! You had to survive. You needed . . a new plan, a new. . hiding place. Yeah, nothing too fancy just . . just something that was. . safe and stuff.

Moving back under the door and towards your frightful house, you looked up at the crack you had crawled through. Moving upward, you realized it would be a bit more difficult to actually go up through this hole in the insulator than it had to go down it. Fudging around with it, you finally got up an through. . although you had now killed even more time!!

How much time did you have left? 7 minutes? Less? And you were not even remotely close to anywhere to hide. The front hallway towards the open door was spotless. . not even a bench or anything around to hide under. It had taken you almost twenty minutes just to walk through all of this.

There just wasn't any time left.

Thinking for a second, you could try hiding under the door. . only Rachel had saw that you had gone there. That would be one of the first places they’d look. You’d be stomped for sure.

In your mind, you could even see how it would be done. It would be like it had been when you got caught about a year ago. You remembered it was when you had snuck out to go see a party. You snuck back in at around 3 in the morning, thinking yourself quite clever. Only, your mother had been waiting for you when you got back!!

“Young man, where were you. . out so late!!”

Turning, you saw your mother staring at you, her eyes filled with daggers.

“I. . uhh. . I w-w.was. . “

Shaking her head, your mother looked at you ominously.

“That isn't good enough, young man!! You know what I have to do to you, know. . . “

Feeling totally helpless then, you threw yourself at your mother’s feet, looking up at her with your arms outstretched.

“N-no!! P-please. . d-don’t do it to me!! N-not again!!”

With a simple gesture, she began to shrink you, you felt your body getting smaller and smaller.

“Don’t take that tone with me, mister!! You're going to be my foot slave for an entire month!! And after that. . your sisters will each get you for another month after that!!

As you dwindled away, you tried to think of an excuse, and fast.

“W-w-what about. . m-my education? Who will. . how will. . I learn?”

Your mother only laughed.

“What could you learn as someone as useless as you are, anyway? Besides. . you haven’t heard about homeschooling?? You’ll be schooled quite well when we are done with you!!”

It had been such a nightmare. Almost a year. . . tortured underneath their feet. All this. . just to end it instantly. You couldn't let it happen. You had to. . to think of something.

Looking back at the front door, you thought about returning there. Maybe, Rachel wouldn't think to look for you there. Besides, she had said it would be impossible for you to get underneath. All you had to do was wait until someone went to get mail and open the entry door. . then escape.

On the other hand, you could always just try and make a rush for the living room. Maybe you could sneak past your family as they searched around for you. It would be far riskier, but hiding underneath the front door could prove almost immediately deadly. You had about five minutes left. . you had to hurry!!!
13112112.title: Panic? Who said anything about panicking. . .

choices: Rush into the living room!
Stay and wait til your mother leaves the area.
131121122.content:
At this point, you knew that your time was almost up. At any moment, your giant family would return . . looking to hunt you down and destroy you!! Thinking it through, you could have went back under the door and hidden there. Realistically, that would be the first place that Rachel would look. She knew that you had focused your efforts there.

What was worse was that Chelsea and your mom also knew you were in that general area!! Anywhere was a safe bet for disaster!!

No, you had to leave this place, and do it as soon as possible.

Bursting into a good run, not too strong and not too slow either, you made your way down the side of the wall, by where the wall finish was. Your plan was simple, while walking around this thing, you might find some hole or area to hide in. It was risky, considering any one of your family members could find you. . but it was your only hope.

BZZZTTTT!!!!

A loud noisy bell went off in the distance, followed by a shrill of a young girl that you recognized. Liv!!

"It's time!! Bug crushing time!!!"

BOOM!! BOOM!!! BOOOM!!!

BOOOM!! BOOM!!! BOOOOM!!!

BOOM!! BOOM!!! BOOOM!!!

BOOOM!! BOOM!!! BOOOOM!!!

Multiple sets of giant feet began to storm in this general direction. It seemed the rumor wheel had been turning on the area that you were located at. You watched carefully as Liv, Rachel, and Chelsea burst into view. They had made a mad bolt over here too.

"No running, girls!! It's not like he can get away, anyway!!" your heard your mother shout as she casually stepped into view, a soft smile on her face. This was it, no playing around now.

Breathing hard, you moved yourself down the line. . carefully keeping yourself from being seen. Looking upward, you saw that Rachel rushed for the door, looking carefully at the insulation.

"He was actually trying to get through the door!!" Rachel said happily as she looked down on the ground carefully.

Rachel backed up, her hands on her face with awe when she noticed the hole that she had inadvertently helped you make.

"Oh my!! He found a hole!!"

Chelsea and Liv followed through, their eyes focused on the door and not you as there large bodies filled up the hallway.

"You don't think. . he got away?!?" Liv spouted, sounding a little disappointed.

Chelsea smiled an arrogant smile and shook her head hard.

"Ha!! It's totally unlikely!! Even if he somehow did get his way through, he would probably only get stuck in between the entry door and the main one!! He is far too stupid to think this whole thing through!!"

You gulped loudly as you saw them examining that area so closely. If you had stayed there. . you would have been totally crushed by now!! Moving quickly, you kept going forward towards the living area. Your mother was still over there though. If you rushed for it now, she might see you. On the other hand, staying here and waiting for that might be a death sentence.

Sweat was pouring all over you as you tried to decide what to do now!!
131121122.title: Risky Business

1311211221.content:
Looking backwards for a second, you see your three sisters carefully dissecting every nook and cranny behind you. . carefully examining the location to find where you were. Heck, even Liv had opened the door and was actually looking around the patio area to see if you had gotten out there. Your other sisters stayed back though, far less optimistic at your success getting to that place. They were right. . but you did not have to like it.

The big problem was that they would be here at your location, very very soon. There really wasn't a lot you could do about it either. It was bound to happen. . so your only hope was to get out of there and find some other kind of shelter.

Breathing in deeply, you started to make a mad dash out of the safety of your corner. . and towards the living room area. Your plan was to get under a couch, wait things out til they got tired of looking. . then go back to the front door to try and escape. You’d probably have to get some food and a little water before you left. . but since Liv could be a messy eater at dinner, you were confident you could get a little bit of her food.

Looking straight ahead, the blue couches underpad was directly in front of you. Escape was only a few feet. . .

WHAAAM!!!!

You screamed as your body flew backwards as you were shaken from your general location and thrown back a little ways.

Deep down, you knew who it was. . but you didn't want to believe that this was happening. You didn't want to believe that you were trapped. . and had no where to go!! Trembling, you brought your face up to see your giant mother Martha. . staring down upon you.

It was over.

After everything you had done to try and escape, you had been caught!!

Your mother didn’t say anything though. She didn't comment or make any kind of derogatory remarks over how you had been so quickly found by her. Instead, she chose to let actions speak louder than her words. You were still on the hard linoleum and you were know pulling yourself backwards, slowly trying to inch your way away from the giant bare foot that had slammed right in front of you.

WHAAAM!!!!!!!

Martha’s other foot slammed forward, now giving you a nice view of your mother’s body looking down at you. Your heart was beating so fast. Not like this. . please, not like this!!

Martha was quiet as she lifted her giant barefoot high into the air and slowly hovered it above your tiny insignificant body. Silently, she began to lower it. Tears in your eyes, you watched the giant foot of the woman who had raised you coming down upon your small form. You had seen this before, you had been underneath her foot before. . but never like this. Never like this.

The first thing that you noticed, was the impact of her giant sole first hitting your body and sending shivers of terror down your spine. Martha was very careful not to put a lot of pressure on you, yet. She wanted you to feel and know exactly what it was that she was doing to you. She didn't respond as you beat at her foot in a vain attempt to get her to stop doing this. You barely felt her move, as she carefully held you in place with her mountainous plains of destruction.
.
There was no response from your mother, as she started to increase the weight of her foot, as you were reduced to an insignificant wreck of a human being as you sobbed, cried, and cursed. . beating the foot with your hands and legs. You felt your body start to bruise and bleed as you hit at her. . hoping and pleading that maybe she would take some mercy on you!!

The giantess had no reaction as she felt small cracks under her foot, as your body began to buckle and shake from the overwhelming pressure of her sole. . slowly crushing the life out of her own son!! Martha started to shiver a little bit, her mind getting very excited about the action that she was taking. . delivering the final justice to her terrible offspring. She licked her lips a little, eyeing you closely in anticipation of what she was about to do. If she was quiet, she could hear your screams of terror, feel the pain that she was doing to you psychologically and soon. . physically.

Other than your loud noises emitting from you, your mom didn't say anything as her foot put all of her weight on you, exploding your body and internal organs. . staining both the floor and the bottom of your mom’s sole. As she felt the impact of your body exploding, your mother let off a soft moan as she felt you expire underneath her. She closed her eyes and gently moved her feet back and forth, spreading your remains around her foot and all over the floor. Moving her foot to the side, she looked down at the blood and guts that was once her son as they dripped down onto the floor.

Martha cocked her head to the side, and a soft smile appeared on her face.

“I think I stepped on a bug, girls!”
1311211221.title: The Mom-ent of your Destruction!

choices: Your attack strategy will utilize the kitchen!
The garage would be where you would drive them all away!
131122.content:
As you laid there, your back on the floor as you watch your titan sized mother and sister walk away. . . part of you just wants to give up. If you just laid here, and never moved again. . then eventually they would come and crush you. Then . . you would never have to fight them again, never have to run, flee, or be tortured horrifically by your massive sized family.

You could hear your mountain sized mother's voice ringing in your ears:

". . . He’s going to realize that he is far too small to do much of anything!! Then. . .while he wastes an hour trying futilely to survive. . .we’ll crush him into nothing!!”

It would be so easy. Just give them what they wanted. Entertainment in the form of torturing and crippling you. This had been how it was your entire life. You were a plaything, a toy, an object to take out their wanton aggression. There was no other way. You remember when you were right beneath your sister Chelsea's feet, pleading and begging to be allowed to live. The hopelessness and the sadness of being defeated as you heard her voice echoing through your head:

“Deuteronomy 17:12” Chelsea continued, “Anyone arrogant enough to reject the verdict of the judge or of the priest who represents the Lord your God must be put to death. Such evil must be purged. . “

Maybe you were evil. . maybe your existence was for their pleasure. You had never been very good at school, never really had that many friends, never gone out with a girl, and ,in fact, you'd never been too great at much of anything. It was your lot in life. Your family would taunt you, abuse you, rape your body with their feet and arms, destroy the essence of who you were by making you less than human. It would be tiresome and bad but. . after all of that. . .it would be over. You could finally rest.

But. . .

If you just laid here, you would in essence, let them win. You would let them have dominion over you. You knew that after you were crushed the only time they would mention you would be when they thought of how weak and helpless you were. Here you were, trying to escape, trying to flee the situation. Trying to find a way outside where you would struggle and eventually die by the elements, birds, or some lucky break would take your existence away.

No.

This was it. Now, you would do what they didn't expect. You would fight them!! Already plans started to come into play on how you would do it. You remember watching home alone and seeing the boy set all those traps for the robbers. If you could do that. . but against your own family. . you could escape. Not just temporarily escape, you would finally be free of them forever.

The big problem was simple though. . how were you going to do this? What kind of traps could you set that would be both good enough for your giant family members to fall for and painful enough to incapacitate them. At this point, you knew that you would have to use lethal force. They were trying to kill you.

Getting back up and off of the floor, you looked around in the living room. This room just didn't seem like a very good place to do anything. Besides, there was not a lot of things you could do to influence the giants here. Thinking carefully, your first idea is to use the bathroom. If you could dump something electrical into water, you might be able to shock them. . but. . how would you even do that at such a tiny size? It just didn't add up. If this was going to work, you would need to go somewhere with more open space.
131122.title: A fighting chance

choices: The trap goes off successfully!!
The trap fails miserably. . .
1311221.content:
You had it all figured out. You'd go into the kitchen and set up various traps for your family, home alone style. They'd come at you, thinking that you were easy prey but would fall before you. You couldn't fail. You couldn't give up.

Making your way into the kitchen, you snickered and laughed at your own thoughts as you came up with all sorts of ways to deal with those pesky family members of yours. You wouldn't be defeated now. You had this!!

As you dementedly made plans, you were unaware that you were being watched from behind. Chelsea had come back, carefully watching you from afar. She turned her head to make sure that her mother didn't see her peeping too. She knew that she had said to let you have this time to herself, but she knew what she really was getting at.

“If there is anyone who curses his father or his mother, he shall surely be put to death; he has cursed his father or his mother, his bloodguiltiness is upon him.” She whispered to herself. One of her favorites. Leviticus 20:9. She knew that is what she meant when she talked about killing the silly tiny bug. Yet, something was different about him. With no hope or no escape, surely he would try and do something out of the ordinary. She wasn't sure what, but she'd get to the bottom of this.

"Hey!!"

Chelsea practically jumped when she turned to see that Rachel was now looking right at her. Giving Rachel dagger eyes, Rachel smirked and gave her a soft grin.

"Ooh. . I get it. We are sneaking, huh? I can do that."

Chelsea ignored Rachel and kept watching the little bug make his way into the kitchen. What was he expecting to do in there? There was no way out. . unless. . he was planning to get out through the garage. The outdoor area might be big enough for him to slip through . . .although he would definitely be eaten by bugs. A fitting end, a bug eaten by the bugs. . but. . . wasn't it her duty to deliver the execution herself? Or at least. . one of the family members should. She had too, afterall.

"Hey!"

Ugh. . Rachel.

Chelsea turned to see that Rachel was now wearing . . one of her hats. She reached up and grabbed it from off of her head.

"Give me that, you clown. Why must I deal with such ramblings! Can't you see that I am trying to administer justice, here? Why are we even here, if not to solve the mysteries of the universe?"

Rachel looked at her and rolled her eyes. Chelsea could be so high and mighty. It was aggravating, but kind of funny to see her rationalize everything to her perspective. Not that she disagreed with her that the bug should be punished but. . where was the fun in a quick or 'righteous' death? Why couldn't the little bug have a long. . fear filled one instead. Already her mind went to some. . dark places on that aspect. She put her finger to her lip as Chelsea resumed her spying.

"Wait. . oh now look what you have done, Rachel. Where is he? Where is the bug?"

Rachel turned around, looking back into the kitchen. She couldn't see the bug anywhere. Where had he gone?? Usually he tried to hide all the time, but in very obvious places. It was unlike him too. . .

CLANG!!

The two sisters turned their attention over to one of the counters that was lower to the ground. They looked at each other with a quick smile. There he was.

"Hey Chelsea. . you think. . you think we should go. . get a closer look? I mean. . we would have to be quiet. . we wouldn't want mom to see us cheating."

Chelsea turned and with a smile quoted from Matthew.

"Do not throw your pearls before swine, or they will trample them under their feet."

Rachel made an angry face and put her hands on her waist.

"Chelsea, are you calling me a pig?"

Chelsea laughed as she pointed towards the kitchen.

"No Rachel, I'm saying that maybe. . you should trample something under your feet."

The two sisters creeped forward, looking for their tiny bug brother.

"I still think you are implying I am a pig."

Chelsea just smiled at that.

______________________________________________________-

Those simple giants. . they thought they were so smart. You, of course, had heard their entire conversation. In fact, it was you who had led them to this very spot. This was it. . your first showdown. You just weren't sure. . if you were ready. You only had one chance. . one shot to make this work out. You had to do it, though. Waiting and watching, you saw your two sisters storm into the kitchen.

"Oh little buggy!!" Rachel said cheerfully, in the hopes of terrorizing you, you suspected. You wouldn't give them the satisfaction. Your face was sweaty, your palms were tight. Now was the time!!
1311221.title: Kitchen Attack Alpha!! Go!!!

choices: Take revenge at normal size.
Shrink your evil family!
13112211.content: As Chelsea and Rachel moved closer and closer to your trap, you began to feel your heart pound. This is it you thought. You pull the makeshift lever down and send several kitchen knifes flying! "Huh, what tha-?!" Chelsea exclaimed as she heard the noise. You two sisters turned and where hit with the sharp knifes. With grim satisfaction you watched as your former family scream and fall down, crying in pain. You knew enough they where finished. In their final moments they both spotted you. "D-damn bug." Rachel says weakly. "H-how could you do this?"Said Chelsea. Solemnly you look over them. "I will no longer be your victim." You say venomously. Suddenly you begin to glow. "Wha-what's happening?!" You soon heard a voice in your head. "You are no longer under their spell. You can now no longer be shrunk and are returning to your normal size." "Who are you?" You say quietly. "The demon who gave them that power. In exchange if a male of their blood kills them it's gone and given to him."
13112211.title: The trap goes off successfully!!

choices: Your sisters 'return' your pin.
Someone comes into the room and see what they are up too.
13112212.content:
Chelsea and Rachel entered into the kitchen quietly, hoping to pull a fast one and torment their little bug brother some more before the hour was up. They were not a hundred percent sure what they would do with him once they found him, but whatever it was, it wouldn't be good. The two sisters looked at each other with a smile as they saw a little ways away some rumblings and shaking. He must have gotten stuck and was moving around and about.

You smiled, hiding below them as they went in the wrong direction. Even at your miniscule size, you knew that shelf was always making noise. There was a mouse or something living below that shelf, occasionally popping up for food now and again. Part of you wanted to not attack just yet, in case the mouse did appear and scare your sisters, but if you waited til then. . they might see you instead. You watched and waited, planning in your head the entire time.

As they approached the spot that the noise came from, you prepared to initiate your attack. You needed to time it just right. One simple mistake and the whole thing would be ruined.

You shouted at your sisters with much fury as you released the rubber band holding the small pin from its makeshift holding station. All you had to do was get one of them in the eye, and they’d be so focused on rushing to the hospital that they’d leave you alone . . . giving you plenty of time to escape from their clutches. Or, if you were feeling bold enough. . maybe set up more traps for their return. It was bold, but what choice did you have?

Releasing the rubber band holding the pin, you watched the metallic item soar through the air, going right at Rachel’s big face. Your eyes soar with it as you see your attack in action. Rachel turns toward the noise and sees the pin coming right at her. Her expression doesn't change as the pin harmlessly falls to the ground, not even getting close to her.

“Woah!! Did the little bug. . “

Chelsea nodded in agreement, pointing at the cupboard that you had been in.

No, no, no, no!! You launched it to early. This. . this wasn’t how. . no!! Suddenly all the feelings of inadequacy and doubt filled your mind like a flood of water. Rushing towards the back of the cupboard, you look for some kind of can or cans to climb, but they were all too high up. It had taken you so long getting all the way up here. Going anywhere else would be almost impossible!!

BOOM!!

BOOM!!

BOOOMM!!!!

From behind, you heard the tremendous stomping of your two giant sisters!! They were. .. they were going to get you for sure. And. . and you didn't think they were going to wait the hour either. Looking furiously, you tried to find some sort of escape. Anything!!

“What’s wrong, little bug warrior!! Not so tough now, are you?!” Rachel said into your cupboard, calmly peeking her face down behind you. Turning around, you watched as your two big sisters stared at you intently. You ran towards the back to an empty hole leading to the shelf below you when your Rachel's giant hand came crashing inside, just barely missing you. Instead of going back in, she knocked a can into the hole, blocking any way down there!!

Moving to the sides, you went for another gap. If they caught you, you would be done for!!

WHAM!!

Rachel's giant hand came slamming down in front of you, creating a wall of flesh that blocked your escape. You looked up at it in wonder, shocked at how fast she was!! The whole hand started to close, very slowly. You screamed, getting up and moving back. You knew that she could close her hand faster than that, the only reason she didn't was to toy with you instead!!

WHAM!!

The whole shelf you were on shock as Chelsea shook it with her hand, a smile briefly appearing on her face before returning to a neutral expression. Moviing up her other hand towards you, Chelsea brought the pin you had launched at Rachel and slammed it into the ground in front of you!!

“I think you dropped something, little one!! Should I. . return it to you?!?”

Your mouth fell and your feet rushed around. . looking for some kind of escape. There. . there had to be something. Some way out. It couldn’t. . it couldn’t end, like this. Looking around, you were totally surrounded. There was just. . no where else to go!! You looked up at your enormous sisters, waiting to see what they would do next. . .
13112212.title: The trap fails miserably. . .

choices: ". . the bug gets two more hours since you girls pestered him."
". . you should return his property to him, Rachel."
131122122.content:
Before you can make another move, you feel your tiny body being pinched by Rachel's big finger. Pulling you out carefully and quickly, you watch the cupboard disappear as you are whisked out. Watching carefully, you see Chelsea smiling at you as Rachel brings you over towards the open kitchen counter. What a disaster.

"Well, I think that you should have this one, Rachel." Chelsea said with a knowing smile. You knew too that whatever Rachel was planning wouldn't be pretty. Not one bit!! Picking you up a bit higher, Rachel placed you onto the counter and brought two seats toward it. One for her and one for Chelsea.

Your heart was racing a mile a minute. The end was nigh. . or worse, you’d live but in terrible pain. This was a bad idea, you should have just tried to run away. You should have never let Chelsea and your mom goad you the way that you did. Now, you’d need a miracle to get out of this one!! Looking from afar, you watched Chelsea silently hold the pin towards you. . but still quite a ways away. She smiled as she looked casually at the small metallic device.

“You really found a tiny pin, didn't you little bug? You know. . these are used for sewing right? That is why they are so tiny, so they can get into those . . .”

As she spoke, she brought the tiny needle closer and closer to you. The needle was indeed small, which was how you were able to use it the way you did anyway. She moved it up and down, up and down, gently hovering it closer and closer to you..

“. . little places!!” Chelsea said as she pushed the needle and gently touched your crotch area. You screamed, which caused your sisters to giggle with delight as the metal just barely touched your body.

“No. . no. . please!!” You whimpered, hoping they were not going to do what you thought they were doing.

“Aww. . are you afraid of me? Do you think that. . I’m going to do something bad to you? I’m hurt!” Chelsea said with a fake look of sadness. You were breathing kind of quickly and you turned to look at Rachel. She didn’t have any kind of expression at all, which kind of scared you more. What was she thinking in that head of hers?

You felt the metal move itself up and towards your head, slowly rubbing the top part of your skull as you grasped towards it, afraid that Chelsea would push down too hard and smash you into oblivion.

“Mmmm. . it is funny. Just moments ago you were so confident. What were you planning to do to Rachel? Were you . . were you planning on hurting her? Even if you were successful in this. . travesty, do you really think that we weren’t going to squish you anyway?!”

The pin started to come down a little bit harder. You were just screaming and crying the pain not too bad, but still highly affecting your psyche. Suddenly, the pin pressure was taken off as Chelsea brought it up and into the air.

1411.content:
You had a lump in hour throat as you heard her say this. Dodge the foot was one of Rachel's favorite twisted games, probably because it wasn't really even a game at all. It was basically just her toying with you for as long as she felt like. You pretty much, as the game was titled, had to dodge her foot as she tried to stomp you. The worst part about this "game" was there was absolutely no way for you to win as it pretty much just went on until Rachel felt like she was done. It was impossible for you to win. In fact, you weren't even sure how you could win considering there wasn't even a victory condition for you. It was just dodge the foot under you couldn't anymore. Rachel grinned wickedly down at you.

"Please Rachel, not dodge the foot! Please just let me go!" You cried up as she laughed.

"Oh come on twerp, I know how much you love this game!"

The last time you had been forced to play this game with Rachel, she had made you run until you collapsed from exhaustion before she stomped you. She then had tossed you into her running shoe and went for a 5 mile run with you suffering under her massive foot. Not only had you had to endure being repeatedly stomped as she ran, you then had to lick her feet clean and clean all the toejam out from between her toes before she trapped you in her running shoe with her sweaty socks for the night. You trembled as you thought of all this as she grinned down at you.

"And since it's no fun just to play the game, we need to spice it up a little bit, how about a friendly wager?" She smirked.

Yeah a friendly wager, nothing friendly about it you thought. "Sure Rachel." You said. You didn't really have a choice.

"If you win, I'll do your chores for, oh I don't know, a month." She smiled.

She could say she'd give you a million dollars, it didn't matter you had no way of beating her. "If I win, oh how about," you saw her look at up at the ceiling as if she was in deep thought while she tapped her chin. God, you hated how she loved to mentally torture and terrorize you. Suddenly she looked back down at you and grinned, "Oh I know! If I win, you're my new footstool!" She said happily.

Fuck.

You stared up at your towering twin sister, terrified of what awaited you. You thought about just not even running but taking away her fun would only lead to a punishment that would be much much worse than being her footstool, not that there was much worse when it came to Rachel.

"Before we begin little bro, let me take off my sneakers. It's a hot one today and my feet are all stuffy in these shoes." She said as she moved her foot and placed her toe against the heel of her opposite sneaker. She was wearing white converse low cut sneakers, the kind pretty much every girl her age wore and just like every girl who wore them in warm weather, she was sockless.

Rachel's tan feet with her pedicured nails painted a nice pink were soon free, having pried off her raunchy sneakers. You could smell her massive sweaty feet, a strong cheesy musky odor emanating from them making you gag. Her feet were reddened from all the walking she had been doing and you cringed as you thought about how sweaty and tacky her massive soles were. She wiggled her monstrous tan toes causing her strong sweaty smell between her toes to wash over you and make you gag once again. You looked up at her and saw her put her hands on her hips in a dominant pose. "Reaaaaaady, Seeeeeettttt, Go!"

You immediately turned and took off running. You heard Rachel's girlish giggles as you ran as hard as you could. You were suddenly cast in a shadow and looked up to see her massive reddened sole above you, sweaty and tacky from being in her sneaker. You screamed as it passed over head before BOOM it came slamming down directly in front of you, inches in your scale from you, knocking you off your feet as the floor shook. The sweaty cheesy odor hit you like a hammer. "Oh! So close!" Rachel chirped. "I'm gonna get you bug!" She sang as you began to run in a different direction.

You didn't get far before, BOOM! Her massive tan foot slammed down in front of you. She laughed once again as you turned and ran.

No matter which way you ran, you always found your path blocked by the one of the massive sweaty feet of your giantess twin sister. Rachel giggled and stomped, loud booms ringing out every time she slammed her huge foot down shaking the floor. The whole time she was taunting and teasing you as she ran you ragged.

You were beginning to tire and we're moving slower and slower. Rachel's grin was getting bigger and bigger as each time you got up slower and moved slower out of the way of her feet. "What's wrong bug? Tired? You better find a second wind or you're gonna be a little loser! Well, more of loser than you already are."

After she almost stomped you, knocking you off your feet, you lay still gasping for breath. "What's wrong now? Don't tell me I tired you out already? It's been like, 5 minutes! You need to hit the gym more fatass." She taunted. "So I guess you're giving up?" She smirked and slowly began to raise her massive foot up over you. You saw her wiggle her monstrous toes as she held her foot over you, her sole sweaty and reddened and the strong cheesy sweaty wafting down to you.

Her foot fell like a hammer, crushing and smothering you under her soft, hot sweaty flesh, the smell of her cheesy sweaty feet all around you. She shifted more of her weight to the foot you were under, her hot, sweaty flesh engulfing you as crushing pressure threatened to pop you beneath her mighty foot.

Rachel's tacky sole peeled off you leaving you covered in her foot sweat and gasping and gagging. She grinned down at you as you desperately gasped for breath.

info.brief_description: Your family has the power to shrink you, and will do so to fulfill their sadistic desires.
info.description:
Your family can shrink you. It is a simple, but devistating fact. Whether for punishment, or for sadistic pleasure, your mother and sisters can cause you to dwindle to approximately an inch, and are quite keen on tortuing you at this size.

-Cast-

Olivia (14) Your younger sister, called Liv by most. She has long brown hair, usually in a braid, and blue eyes. She is a bit of a mess at the moment, strugling through puberty and about to start her first year of high school. She can be moody, and the stresses of her young life often get to her. This frustration is, unfortunately, channeled towards you, as you are one of the few things she has power over at her age.

Rachel (18) Your twin, a few seconds younger, although she continually calls you 'little brother'. She is athletic, charismatic and strong-headed, with short, dirty blonde hair and brown eyes. She loves teasing you and getting under your skin, which often leads to an outburst from you, and then sanctioned punishment from your mother. In the spirit of sibling rivaly, she will also often challenge you to bets or games, though when she wins it always means torture for you.

Chelsea (21) Your oldest sister. She dyes her hair red, though it is naturally brown. She has freckles, hazel eyes, and a devious smile. She is a Religious Studies major at a local university, a subject with which she is deeply, perhaps even eccentrically, familiar. She often breaks into a lecture or monologue without thinking about it, and often uses her knowledge as a rationalization for the incredibly cruel acts she commits towards you.

Martha (40) Your mother. Tall and thin, with long, straight blonde hair and hazel eyes. A stern and strict housekeeper, she relishes in punishment. While some of this discipline falls on your sisters, it is mostly directed at you. Just as well, she enjoys incorporating your sisters into your punishments, which none of them object to. Manipulative and patently unfair at times, you can't help but wonder what caused her to become the cruel woman she is. It hardly matters, of course, as she is the matriarch, and as far as the household goes, her word is law.

Your father has been absent for what part of your life has memory. You often imagine your condition was shared through your shared genetic lineage. You hoped, perhaps before your birth, maybe even before he was aware of it, your father escaped from this tortuous family. But will you ever escape?

Not if you're still everyone's favorite plaything.

Good luck.


-Rules-

No male interaction, please. Forget that. Make sure male character additions have a choice preempting them, though.
Try to write well, and don't break the second-person perspective.
Feel free to add any sort of interaction so long as it makes sense.
No choice chains.
